original: mchod pa la sogs pa byas shing /
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs pa byas shing /
translated: Make offerings and so forth.

original: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas yi ge rnams kyi nang du bcug ste /
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas yi ge rnams kyi nang du bcug ste /
translated: Having made offerings with the mantras of the eight lines, insert the letters.

original: bsgrub bya yang dang po'i rang ming gi yi ge las byung ba'i dam tshig sems dpa' la bcug pa de dang / 'khor lo de yid kyis kha dang snying ga dang rdo rje'i lam nas padmar bcug ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya yang dang po'i rang ming gi yi ge las byung ba'i dam tshig sems dpa' la bcug pa de dang / 'khor lo de yid kyis kha dang snying ga dang rdo rje'i lam nas padmar bcug ste /
translated: Also, the one to be accomplished is inserted into the pledge being who arises from the first letter of his name. That and the wheel are inserted into the lotus through the mouth, heart, and vajra path of the mind.

original: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis dbang bskur nas phyi rol du gzhag cing /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis dbang bskur nas phyi rol du gzhag cing /
translated: Having conferred empowerment with the assembly of deities summoned by the light rays of the seed syllable in one’s heart, place them outside.

original: bsgrub bya kho na khro bo'i tshogs dang khyad par du bgegs mthar byed kyi tshogs spros pas legs par bsrungs pa la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya kho na khro bo'i tshogs dang khyad par du bgegs mthar byed kyi tshogs spros pas legs par bsrungs pa la /
translated: The one to be accomplished is well protected by the assembly of wrathful ones and in particular by the assembly of Vighnāntakara emanated from oneself.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi 'od las byung ba'i bdud rtsi dang byang chub sems kyi rgyun rnams kyis lus la mngon par khyab pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi 'od las byung ba'i bdud rtsi dang byang chub sems kyi rgyun rnams kyis lus la mngon par khyab pa la /
translated: The streams of elixir and bodhicitta that emerge from the light of the Bhagavat’s mantra completely pervade one’s body.

original: sngags kyi tshogs mtha' dag gi 'od las byung ba'i lha'i tshogs dkar po rnams kyis bum pa dkar po'i bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur bas yang dag par sbyor ba las zhu bar gyur te /
analyzed: sngags kyi tshogs mtha' dag gi 'od las byung ba'i lha'i tshogs dkar po rnams kyis bum pa dkar po'i bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur bas yang dag par sbyor ba las zhu bar gyur te /
translated: The assembly of white deities that emerge from the light of the entire assembly of mantras confer the empowerment of the white vase elixir, which melts into the bodhicitta.

original: byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid 'jug pa'i dbang bskur gyis kyang mngon par dbang bskur bzhin pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid 'jug pa'i dbang bskur gyis kyang mngon par dbang bskur bzhin pas /
translated: Since one is also empowered by the empowerment of entering the nature of bodhicitta,

original: skyon thams cad dang bral bar bsams nas /🔽rig pa'i rgyal po'i phreng ba'i sngags dang / aom hr'i: ha ha che ge la sh'a ntim raksh'i ku ru ku ru h'um sarba p'a pam phat /
analyzed: skyon thams cad dang bral bar bsams nas / rig pa'i rgyal po'i phreng ba'i sngags dang / aom hr'i: ha ha che ge la sh'a ntim raksh'i ku ru ku ru h'um sarba p'a pam phat /
translated: imagine that one is free from all faults.🔽Recite the essence mantra of the king of knowledge mantras and the quintessence mantra:

original: ces pa nye ba'i snying po yang bsgrag go //
analyzed: ces pa nye ba'i snying po yang bsgrag go //
translated: oṃ hrīḥ ha ha, for such and such, pacify, protect, protect, hūṃ, phaṭ to all misdeeds.

original: de nas phreng ba'i sngags zlos shing 'khor lo skud pa dkar pos dkris te rig pa'i ngo bo mgo bo'am mgrin pa'am dpung par gdags so //
analyzed: de nas phreng ba'i sngags zlos shing 'khor lo skud pa dkar pos dkris te rig pa'i ngo bo mgo bo'am mgrin pa'am dpung par gdags so //
translated: Then, reciting the mantra of the rosary, one should wrap the wheel with white thread and attach it to one’s head, throat, or arm, the essence of awareness.

original: de las rdo rje lha mo rnams byin gyis rlob cing bgegs med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las rdo rje lha mo rnams byin gyis rlob cing bgegs med par 'gyur ro //
translated: From that, the vajra goddesses bless and one becomes free from obstacles.

original: g-yul du yang rgyal lo //
analyzed: g-yul du yang rgyal lo //
translated: One is victorious in battle.

original: mar dang 'o ma dang / bdud rtsi lnga'i chur 'khor lo bcug ste /
analyzed: mar dang 'o ma dang / bdud rtsi lnga'i chur 'khor lo bcug ste /
translated: One should place the wheel in water with clarified butter, milk, and the five nectars,

original: @252a * // phreng ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bkrus nas nad dang bcas pa nad mad par byed do //
analyzed: @252a * // phreng ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bkrus nas nad dang bcas pa nad mad par byed do //
translated: and sprinkle it with the mantra of the rosary. One who is sick becomes healthy.

original: chang gi nang du bcug nas des de ltar gtor na nad med pa nad dang bcas par byed do zhes pa la sogs pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: chang gi nang du bcug nas des de ltar gtor na nad med pa nad dang bcas par byed do zhes pa la sogs pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should place it in beer and sprinkle it with that. One who is healthy becomes sick. One should understand this and so forth.

original: las kyi dbye ba las kha dog dang bsam pa dang rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang bskul ba'i dbye ba rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi dbye ba las kha dog dang bsam pa dang rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang bskul ba'i dbye ba rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the divisions of color, intention, application, and urging from the divisions of the rites.

original: gzhan yang zhi ba'i las su las rab 'byam thams cad 'dus par gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhi ba'i las su las rab 'byam thams cad 'dus par gsungs te /
translated: Moreover, all the rites are included in the pacifying rite, as stated in the Compendium of Practice.

original: zhi ba ni mngon par mi 'dod pa'i skyon thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro zhes pa bri bya'i phyir zlog gi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: zhi ba ni mngon par mi 'dod pa'i skyon thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro zhes pa bri bya'i phyir zlog gi de kho na nyid do //
translated: Thus, the reality of the reversal is to be written.

original: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor gyis kha sbyor 'byed pa yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor gyis kha sbyor 'byed pa yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: In that way, the separation of the union by the yoga of Vajra Humkara is to be stated.

original: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i lha'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i lha'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste /
translated: The circle of deities summoned by the light rays of the seed syllable at one's heart is drawn out through the vajra path.

original: lha mo'i padmar gnod mdzes kyi gzugs su bskyed cing bka' bsgos nas /
analyzed: lha mo'i padmar gnod mdzes kyi gzugs su bskyed cing bka' bsgos nas /
translated: Having generated the form of Sumbha in the lotus of the goddess and given the command,

original: sgrub byed rdo rje'i lam nas zhugs pas /🔽des de'i snying padma sbyar ba phye nas der gnas pa'i bsrung ba'i lha rnams la /
analyzed: sgrub byed rdo rje'i lam nas zhugs pas / des de'i snying padma sbyar ba phye nas der gnas pa'i bsrung ba'i lha rnams la /
translated: the one to be accomplished enters through the vajra path.🔽That one opens the joined lotus of the heart of the one to be accomplished.

original: de la gnod pa dang dmyal bar mchog tu gzhol ba nyid gsan du gzhug cing /
analyzed: de la gnod pa dang dmyal bar mchog tu gzhol ba nyid gsan du gzhug cing /
translated: The deities of protection abiding there are to be made to hear the harm to that one and the supreme inclination to hell.

original: 'byed pa'i ched du gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: 'byed pa'i ched du gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
translated: The request is to be made for the sake of the separation.

original: khyed rnams kyis 'di rjes su gnang ba kho na'o zhes mkhyen par gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyed rnams kyis 'di rjes su gnang ba kho na'o zhes mkhyen par gsol bar bya'o //
translated: You should understand that you should only grant this later.

original: ji srid du rim gyis de'i skyon rjes su dgongs nas khros pa rnams bcom ste phyir gshegs pa'i bar du bsgom mo //
analyzed: ji srid du rim gyis de'i skyon rjes su dgongs nas khros pa rnams bcom ste phyir gshegs pa'i bar du bsgom mo //
translated: One should meditate until one understands the faults of anger in sequence, and the angry ones are destroyed and depart.

original: de nas de rnams rang gi 'khor lo la gzhug cing /
analyzed: de nas de rnams rang gi 'khor lo la gzhug cing /
translated: Then, one should cause them to enter one's own mandala,

original: bcing ba dang mnyes pa dang dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba yang cho ga bzhin du sgrub po zhes 'di'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sbyar ba 'byed pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bcing ba dang mnyes pa dang dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba yang cho ga bzhin du sgrub po zhes 'di'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sbyar ba 'byed pa gsungs so //
translated: and one should accomplish the binding, the pleasing, the consecration, the worship, the praise, and the tasting of elixir, according to the rite.

original: de nas gnod mdzes kyis de'i shes pa'i sems la khu tshur gyis bzung nas rdo rje gnyis sbyar ba'i dbus su bcug ste /
analyzed: de nas gnod mdzes kyis de'i shes pa'i sems la khu tshur gyis bzung nas rdo rje gnyis sbyar ba'i dbus su bcug ste /
translated: Then, Sumbha, having seized that mind of consciousness with his fist, should place it in the middle of the two vajras joined together.

original: aom phat che ge bha ksha ya phat ksha: h'um phat ces pa dang / h'um phat ram ram ram che ge mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ram ram ram h'um phat ces bzlas pa las khro bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis brdeg bzhin pa gsol bzhin pa rang gi lha mo'i padma'i nang du bcug nas /
analyzed: aom phat che ge bha ksha ya phat ksha: h'um phat ces pa dang / h'um phat ram ram ram che ge mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ram ram ram h'um phat ces bzlas pa las khro bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis brdeg bzhin pa gsol bzhin pa rang gi lha mo'i padma'i nang du bcug nas /
translated: Then, imagine that the wrathful ones and the dakinis, while beating and eating him, place him in the lotus of one's own deity's consort.

original: 'od gsal ba la bcug pa'i de ma thag tu h'um las skyes shing h'um dang bcas pa'i rdo rjes mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su bskyed de /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba la bcug pa'i de ma thag tu h'um las skyes shing h'um dang bcas pa'i rdo rjes mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su bskyed de /
translated: Immediately after he enters clear light, he is born from a hum and has a hum, and one generates him in the form of Akshobhya.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bcug la mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du btang ngo //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bcug la mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du btang ngo //
translated: Then, after he enters the mandala of exalted wisdom, he is sent to the buddhafield of Akshobhya.

original: 'o na de @252b ltar byed pa ci ltar sdig pa rnams kyis mi gos she na /
analyzed: 'o na de @252b ltar byed pa ci ltar sdig pa rnams kyis mi gos she na /
translated: One may wonder, How is it that one is not defiled by sins by acting in this way?

original: gang phyir sbyin pa dang mgu bar bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis ma bzlog pa dbang du bya ba dang bskrad pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya ma yin pa la /
analyzed: gang phyir sbyin pa dang mgu bar bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis ma bzlog pa dbang du bya ba dang bskrad pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya ma yin pa la /
translated: It is because one does not turn away from the practice of generosity, pleasing others, and so forth, and because one does not practice subjugation, banishment, and so forth, which are not to be practiced.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par gsol ba btab pa rnams kyis rjes su gnang bas sam ma bkab pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par gsol ba btab pa rnams kyis rjes su gnang bas sam ma bkab pas /
translated: The Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, being petitioned, have given their consent, or have not concealed it.

original: snying rje chen po kho nas sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid la rjes su byed pa kho nas kha sbyor 'byed pa 'di bsgrub par bya'i /
analyzed: snying rje chen po kho nas sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid la rjes su byed pa kho nas kha sbyor 'byed pa 'di bsgrub par bya'i /
translated: One should accomplish this separation of the two, by means of great compassion alone, by means of the mere conformity to the reality of illusion.

original: ma rtogs pas ni de la mos pa brtan pa mi bya ba kho na'o //
analyzed: ma rtogs pas ni de la mos pa brtan pa mi bya ba kho na'o //
translated: But one who has not realized it should not have firm conviction in it.

original: gzhan yang bsgrub bya sdig pa byas pa ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mngon shes kyis shes nas mngon spyod bya bar bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ngo zhes gsungs so //🔽de ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga yis //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgrub bya sdig pa byas pa ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mngon shes kyis shes nas mngon spyod bya bar bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ngo zhes gsungs so // de ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga yis //
translated: Moreover, the Blessed One has permitted the performance of the rite of assault, when one knows by means of the superknowledges that the person to be converted will be born in the evil destinies because of his evil deeds.🔽By the rite as taught,

original: yang dag gsungs pas gang gsungs pa'i //
analyzed: yang dag gsungs pas gang gsungs pa'i //
translated: the one who has been taught by the true teacher,🔽that killer,

original: gsod pa de yang rmongs rnams kyis //🔽phyin ci log tu brtags byas shing //
analyzed: gsod pa de yang rmongs rnams kyis // phyin ci log tu brtags byas shing //
translated: is falsely imagined by the ignorant.

original: phyin ci log tu bzung ba 'di //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu bzung ba 'di //
translated: This false conception

original: sred dang zhe sdang mun bsgribs pas //
analyzed: sred dang zhe sdang mun bsgribs pas //
translated: is obscured by the darkness of craving and hatred.

original: skye bo rnams ni bsad byas nas //
analyzed: skye bo rnams ni bsad byas nas //
translated: Having killed all beings,

original: kha ni thur bltas mnar med 'gro //
analyzed: kha ni thur bltas mnar med 'gro //
translated: one goes to Avīci, facing downward.

original: zhes so // brgyad pa zhes pa ha'i sa bon te /
analyzed: zhes so // brgyad pa zhes pa ha'i sa bon te /
translated: The eighth is the seed of ha.

original: rigs kyis gcig nyid de gsal bas ni ha yig bcu gnyis rnams so //
analyzed: rigs kyis gcig nyid de gsal bas ni ha yig bcu gnyis rnams so //
translated: By the family, it is one, and by the manifestation, it is the twelve ha syllables.

original: ri r'i li l'i dang bral ba'i phyi mo bcu gnyis dang ldan pa rnams ni ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ha: zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ri r'i li l'i dang bral ba'i phyi mo bcu gnyis dang ldan pa rnams ni ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ha: zhes pa'o //
translated: The twelve vowels devoid of ri, ri, li, and li are ha, ha, hi, hi, hu, hu, he, he, ai, ai, o, and o.

original: yi ge bar du chod byas nas //
analyzed: yi ge bar du chod byas nas //
translated: Having interrupted the syllables,

original: zhes pa / h'a h'i h'u hee hoo ha: zhes pa dor nas he ru ka'i yan lag drug rnams zhes rten dang brten pa dag tha mi dad par brtags pa las brjod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / h'a h'i h'u hee hoo ha: zhes pa dor nas he ru ka'i yan lag drug rnams zhes rten dang brten pa dag tha mi dad par brtags pa las brjod pa'o //
translated: having abandoned ha, hi, hu, ai, and o, the six limbs of Heruka are imagined as nondifferent from the support and the supported.

original: de ltar gzhan du yang ji ltar rigs pa rtogs par gyis shig /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan du yang ji ltar rigs pa rtogs par gyis shig /
translated: Thus, one should understand elsewhere as appropriate.

original: dpa' bo rnams mnyam sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams mnyam sbyor ba ni /
translated: The union of the heroes

original: aom na ma: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom na ma: sv'a h'a /
translated: is oṃ, namaḥ, svāhā,

original: boo sha ta h'um h'um phat ces pa drug rnams /
analyzed: boo sha ta h'um h'um phat ces pa drug rnams /
translated: vauṣaṭ, hūṃ, hūṃ, phaṭ, the six.

original: ha yig re re las sngon du gnas pa rnams te /
analyzed: ha yig re re las sngon du gnas pa rnams te /
translated: From each ha syllable, they are placed in front.

original: aom ha na ma hi /
analyzed: aom ha na ma hi /
translated: Oṃ, ha, namaḥ, ha, hi, vauṣaṭ, ha, hu, hūṃ, ha, ai, phaṭ, ha, oṃ.

original: sv'a h'a hu /
analyzed: sv'a h'a hu /
translated: svāhā huṃ

original: boo sha ta he /
analyzed: boo sha ta he /
translated: boṣata he

original: h'um h'um ho /
analyzed: h'um h'um ho /
translated: huṃ huṃ ho

original: phat ham zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: phat ham zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: phaṭ haṃ.

original: 'di rnams ni go cha'i sngags kyi yi ge drug rnams te /
analyzed: 'di rnams ni go cha'i sngags kyi yi ge drug rnams te /
translated: These are the six syllables of the armor mantra.

original: snying ga la sogs pa drug rnams su gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: snying ga la sogs pa drug rnams su gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: They should be placed in the six places, heart, etc.

original: dang po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dang po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is what is said by the passage beginning with “first. ”

original: cis go cha rim pas bsgom zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: cis go cha rim pas bsgom zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is the armor meditation done in stages? It is said:

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “vajra” and so on.

original: bzang po ni gar gyi nyams dgu rnams kyis rtsen pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: bzang po ni gar gyi nyams dgu rnams kyis rtsen pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: “Excellent” means skilled in the play of the nine moods of dance.

original: srung ba'i 'khor lor he ru ka rdo rje sems dpar byas nas ye shes sems @253a * //
analyzed: srung ba'i 'khor lor he ru ka rdo rje sems dpar byas nas ye shes sems @253a * //
translated: Having made Heruka into Vajrasattva in the protection wheel, the gnosis being Akṣobhya is placed in the heart.

original: dpa' mi bskyod pa bcug ste de dang ro gcig par byas nas /
analyzed: dpa' mi bskyod pa bcug ste de dang ro gcig par byas nas /
translated: Having made them of one taste,

original: he ru ka nyid de rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs nyid du dran par bya'o //
analyzed: he ru ka nyid de rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs nyid du dran par bya'o //
translated: Heruka himself should be remembered in the form of Vajra-Humkara.

original: yang na he ru ka ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: yang na he ru ka ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
translated: Alternatively, Heruka is the commitment being.

original: de'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsams nas /
analyzed: de'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsams nas /
translated: Having visualized the gnosis being and the concentration being in his heart,

original: he ru ka nyid de sngon du grub pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i bdag nyid can bsams mo //
analyzed: he ru ka nyid de sngon du grub pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i bdag nyid can bsams mo //
translated: Heruka himself, who is the nature of the gnosis being accomplished previously, is contemplated.

original: khro bo spros pa 'bar bas nye bar mtshon pa rnams kyis te /
analyzed: khro bo spros pa 'bar bas nye bar mtshon pa rnams kyis te /
translated: By the blazing of the emanated wrathful ones, he is marked.

original: gang las bgegs rnams 'khrugs pa de de skad do //
analyzed: gang las bgegs rnams 'khrugs pa de de skad do //
translated: From whom the obstructors are agitated, he is that.

original: gtsigs pa ni rol pa'i sku can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gtsigs pa ni rol pa'i sku can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: He is fierce because he has a body of play.

original: kha cig rnams mchog tu gtsigs pa ste /
analyzed: kha cig rnams mchog tu gtsigs pa ste /
translated: Some are very fierce.

original: rtsub pa'i sku can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsub pa'i sku can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because he has a body of roughness.

original: 'jigs rung ni sbrul gyi rgyan dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: 'jigs rung ni sbrul gyi rgyan dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: He is frightening because of his snake ornaments, his contorted face, and so forth.

original: khro bo rnams kyis gang gi bka' sgrub par byed pa'i he ru ka de ni de skad do //
analyzed: khro bo rnams kyis gang gi bka' sgrub par byed pa'i he ru ka de ni de skad do //
translated: The Heruka who is the one whose command the wrathful ones carry out is that.

original: phyogs ni phyogs dang 'brel ba'i gdug pa can rnams so //
analyzed: phyogs ni phyogs dang 'brel ba'i gdug pa can rnams so //
translated: The directions are the evil ones connected with the directions.

original: nyis 'gyur ni 'dab ma bcu drug gnyis te gzhan no //
analyzed: nyis 'gyur ni 'dab ma bcu drug gnyis te gzhan no //
translated: The double is the other, the two sets of sixteen petals.

original: dpa' bo dgod pa ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo dgod pa ni /
translated: The placement of the heroes

original: 'dab ma rnams la zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma rnams la zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: is on the petals, the remainder.

original: mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma'i sa bon te /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma'i sa bon te /
translated: The dakinis are the seed syllables of the dakinis.

analyzed: 'khrul 'khor gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin no //

analyzed: de kho na snying po ste tshad mas 'thad pa nyid kyis mchog gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de ni de skad do //

translated: That Vairocana, who is victorious over the three worlds, is also the nature of the gnosis being. Having summoned the wrathful one into oneself, together with all the tathāgatas, he should be caused to enter.

original: de ltar ro gcig tu gyur nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sa'i lha mo bkug ste /🔽aom bh'u kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / h'um lam h'um zhes pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du sa gzhi bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de ltar ro gcig tu gyur nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sa'i lha mo bkug ste / aom bh'u kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / h'um lam h'um zhes pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du sa gzhi bsgoms nas /
translated: Having become of one taste in that way, the earth goddess is summoned in the manner that will be explained.🔽With the mantra oṃ bhūkāra, she is visualized as being like space, and with hūṃ laṃ hūṃ, the ground is visualized as having the nature of a vajra.

original: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes mngon par bsngags te /
analyzed: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes mngon par bsngags te /
translated: Then, with the mantra oṃ medini vajra bhava vajra bandha hūṃ,

original: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab po zhes pas sa gzhi @256b yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab po zhes pas sa gzhi @256b yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: The ground is purified by the three syllables, OṂ, ĀḤ, and HŪṂ.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: sngags pas rdo rje sems bzlas shing //
analyzed: sngags pas rdo rje sems bzlas shing //
translated: The mantrin, reciting Vajrasattva,

original: rdo rje lta stangs kyis blta bya //
analyzed: rdo rje lta stangs kyis blta bya //
translated: should look with the vajra gaze.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi cha /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi cha /
translated: Even if the ground of the maṇḍala

original: skyon dang ldan pa'ang dag par byed //
analyzed: skyon dang ldan pa'ang dag par byed //
translated: is flawed, it will be purified.

original: rtog pa la gnas sngags pa yis //
analyzed: rtog pa la gnas sngags pa yis //
translated: The mantrin who abides in the imagination

original: gang zhig sa ni rnam sbyong ba //
analyzed: gang zhig sa ni rnam sbyong ba //
translated: purifies the ground

original: 'di ni dag min gsang dbang po //
analyzed: 'di ni dag min gsang dbang po //
translated: with the impure, the lord of secrets,

original: byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pas //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pas //
translated: abandoning the thought of enlightenment.

original: zhes so // de yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas 'dus bya'o zhes sa gzhi yongs su sbyang ba /
analyzed: zhes so // de yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas 'dus bya'o zhes sa gzhi yongs su sbyang ba /
translated: And that should be collected by the process that will be explained.

original: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa sngon ma can nye bar sdud pa na //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa sngon ma can nye bar sdud pa na //
translated: Having made the purification of the ground, the prior possession of the consecration by the three syllables,

original: padma'i skor ba yang de sngon ma can byas nas sa yongs su gzung ba'i don du nye bar 'gro'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: padma'i skor ba yang de sngon ma can byas nas sa yongs su gzung ba'i don du nye bar 'gro'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: and having made the prior possession of the lotus circumambulation, one should approach for the purpose of taking possession of the ground.🔽It is said:

original: g-yas pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Right” and so forth.

original: rkang pa'i mthil dag tu h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba gang gis bkod pa de ni de skad do //
analyzed: rkang pa'i mthil dag tu h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba gang gis bkod pa de ni de skad do //
translated: The one who has placed blazing vajras arisen from hūṃs on the soles of his feet is so called.

original: nga rgyal dang bcas pa yang brtan pa ste /
analyzed: nga rgyal dang bcas pa yang brtan pa ste /
translated: He is also firm,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid la /
translated: in the nature of all the buddhas, the essence of Vajradhara.

original: nang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin yang /
analyzed: nang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin yang /
translated: Although he is inwardly the nature of vajra mind,

original: phyi rol du zhal rnam par 'gyur zhing smin ma 'khyog pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sgro btags pa'i khro bo /
analyzed: phyi rol du zhal rnam par 'gyur zhing smin ma 'khyog pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sgro btags pa'i khro bo /
translated: he is externally wrathful, with a distorted face, contorted eyebrows, and so on.🔽He is wrathful in the sense of being imputed with wrath.

original: de dag gis snying gar gnas pa'i h'um yig las spro bzhin pa shin tu nga rgyal gyi h'um yig yang yang du brjod cing /
analyzed: de dag gis snying gar gnas pa'i h'um yig las spro bzhin pa shin tu nga rgyal gyi h'um yig yang yang du brjod cing /
translated: He should recite the hūṃ of great pride again and again, emanating from the hūṃ at his heart.

original: 'di yang brjod de /
analyzed: 'di yang brjod de /
translated: He should also recite this:

original: phyir dengs shig ces pa la sogs pa 'gyes par 'gyur zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: phyir dengs shig ces pa la sogs pa 'gyes par 'gyur zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: “Go away!” and so on, ending with “dissolve.”

original: khro bo zhes pa khro bo'i lha'i sku can gyi snying ga'i sa bon las phyogs rnams su spros pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo zhes pa khro bo'i lha'i sku can gyi snying ga'i sa bon las phyogs rnams su spros pa'o //
translated: “Wrathful” means emanating in the directions from the seed syllable at the heart of the deity of wrathful form.

original: de ltar zhes pas de'i phyir 'di ltar brjod pa'o //🔽phyag na rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas bdag nyid nye bar ston zhing /
analyzed: de ltar zhes pas de'i phyir 'di ltar brjod pa'o // phyag na rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas bdag nyid nye bar ston zhing /
translated: Thus, because of that, it is said in this way.

original: 'gro ba tshar gcod pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa'i nus pa 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: 'gro ba tshar gcod pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa'i nus pa 'chad par byed do //
translated: With “Vajrapāṇi” and so forth, he teaches himself and explains the ability to destroy and care for migrating beings.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: de kho na nyid bsdus par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus par gsungs pa /
translated: In the Compendium of Reality,

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes /
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes /
translated: then Vajrapāṇi

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho rnams thams cad na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho rnams thams cad na /
translated: in all the oceans of clouds of the infinite world systems

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de rnams lcags kyus bkug nas gsungs pa ;
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de rnams lcags kyus bkug nas gsungs pa ;
translated: summoned with a hook all the lords of the three worlds, Maheśvara, and so forth, and said:🔽“You must understand the scriptures in the teachings of the Tathāgata and protect my words.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gtsug lag rnams rtogs par gyis shig / bdag gi bka' yang srungs shig / de nas gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha chen po des smras pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gtsug lag rnams rtogs par gyis shig / bdag gi bka' yang srungs shig / de nas gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha chen po des smras pa /
translated: Then, in this world system, the great god Maheśvara said:

original: bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug bdag la yang bka' ster ba 'di su lags bcom ldan @257a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug bdag la yang bka' ster ba 'di su lags bcom ldan @257a * //
translated: “Blessed One, who is this one who gives orders to me, Maheśvara?”

original: 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said to Maheśvara and the others,

original: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang dam tshig dang sdom pa la gtsug lag rnams sgrubs shig /'di ni gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje khros pa khro bo gtum po byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang dam tshig dang sdom pa la gtsug lag rnams sgrubs shig /'di ni gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje khros pa khro bo gtum po byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
translated: You should practice the three refuges, the commitments, and the vows in the scriptures. This is the wrathful one, the great bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi, the fierce wrathful one,

original: rdo rje 'bar bas khyed rnams dang khams gsum po mtha' dag brlag par byas na mi rung ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar bas khyed rnams dang khams gsum po mtha' dag brlag par byas na mi rung ngo //
translated: who, if he were to destroy you and the entire three realms with his blazing vajra, it would not be right.

original: de nas dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po nyid kyi shes pa la dbang bas phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstan pa'i don du //
analyzed: de nas dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po nyid kyi shes pa la dbang bas phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstan pa'i don du //
translated: Then, in order to show fear to Vajrapāṇi, Maheśvara, with his knowledge of being the lord of the entire three worlds,

original: gtum zhing khro ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: gtum zhing khro ba chen po nyid //
translated: displayed his great fierceness and wrath,

original: 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'chang chen po nyid //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'chang chen po nyid //
translated: his great bearing of a terrifying form,

original: 'bar ba spro ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: 'bar ba spro ba chen po nyid //
translated: his great blazing and radiating,

original: drag po'i gad rgyangs dgod pa chen po nyid tshogs pa rnams dang lhan cig ston cing smras pa /
analyzed: drag po'i gad rgyangs dgod pa chen po nyid tshogs pa rnams dang lhan cig ston cing smras pa /
translated: and his great laughter of ferocity, and said to the assembly:🔽I am the great lord of the three worlds,

original: nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po yin na /
analyzed: nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po yin na /
translated: I am the lord of the three worlds.

original: khyod nga la bka' sbyin par byed do //🔽de nas phyag na rdo rjes /
analyzed: khyod nga la bka' sbyin par byed do // de nas phyag na rdo rjes /
translated: You should obey my orders.🔽Then Vajrapani,

original: rdo rje rol pa dang bcas par gsor zhing ;
analyzed: rdo rje rol pa dang bcas par gsor zhing ;
translated: wielding his vajra with a dance,

original: rnam par dgod cing gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par dgod cing gsungs pa /
translated: and with a smile, said:

original: kho ste rtogs par gyis shig / lus srul po dang mi'i sha nga'i bka' bzhin byed na zo zhig / smras pa /
analyzed: kho ste rtogs par gyis shig / lus srul po dang mi'i sha nga'i bka' bzhin byed na zo zhig / smras pa /
translated: If you obey the orders of the flesh-eating rakshasa and human flesh-eating rakshasa, then eat him.🔽 He said, You should also obey my orders.

original: khyod kyang nga'i bka' skyongs shig / de nas phyag na rdo rjes h'um zhes gsungs pa na 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams thams cad kha bu btu 'gyel lo //
analyzed: khyod kyang nga'i bka' skyongs shig / de nas phyag na rdo rjes h'um zhes gsungs pa na 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams thams cad kha bu btu 'gyel lo //
translated: Then, when Vajrapani said hum, the lords of the three worlds all fell down like a bundle of lotuses.

original: lha chen po yang sa la 'gyel zhing shi'o //
analyzed: lha chen po yang sa la 'gyel zhing shi'o //
translated: Even the great god fell to the ground and died.

original: badzra au tti shtha zhes gsungs pa na lha rnams lha'i bde ba rnams nyams su myong bas langs te /
analyzed: badzra au tti shtha zhes gsungs pa na lha rnams lha'i bde ba rnams nyams su myong bas langs te /
translated: When he said vajra uttistha, the gods arose, having experienced the bliss of the gods.

original: badzra a'a yu: zhes pa shi ba slar 'tsho ba'i snying pos gsos nas /
analyzed: badzra a'a yu: zhes pa shi ba slar 'tsho ba'i snying pos gsos nas /
translated: With the essence mantra vajra ayuh, he revived the dead.

original: phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g-yon pas mnan nas /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g-yon pas mnan nas /
translated: Vajrapani, having pressed down on the great god with his left foot,

original: g-yas pas au ma'i nu ma'i khur 'tshir ro //
analyzed: g-yas pas au ma'i nu ma'i khur 'tshir ro //
translated: squeezes the breast of Uma with his right.

original: de nas lha chen po phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil reg pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams nyams su myong zhing /
analyzed: de nas lha chen po phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil reg pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams nyams su myong zhing /
translated: Then, the great god, having touched the sole of Vajrapani's foot, experienced the concentrations, powers of memory, and doors of liberation of all the Tathagatas.

original: lha chen po'i lus dang au ma yang bla ma'i yon du phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil la phul nas /
analyzed: lha chen po'i lus dang au ma yang bla ma'i yon du phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil la phul nas /
translated: The great god and Uma, as a gift to the guru, offered themselves to the sole of Vajrapani's foot.

original: 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams 'das te thal bas g-yogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su thal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes so //
analyzed: 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams 'das te thal bas g-yogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su thal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes so //
translated: They were born as the Tathagata called Bhasiraja, in the world called Bhasacchadi, after passing through countless worlds below.

original: lha langs pa rnams kyang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig la @257b gzhag go zhes so //
analyzed: lha langs pa rnams kyang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig la @257b gzhag go zhes so //
translated: The gods who rose up were also placed in Vajrapani's own commitments.

original: chen po zhes pa chen po rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: chen po zhes pa chen po rnams kyang ste /
translated: The great ones are also great ones.

original: don chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: don chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir la /
translated: In order to accomplish the great aim,

original: rdo rje rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rnams kyang ste /
translated: and also the vajras,

original: bdud rnams kyis mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bdud rnams kyis mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they are indivisible even by the demons.

original: byed pa rnams ni g-yas brkyang stabs la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: byed pa rnams ni g-yas brkyang stabs la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: The postures are the right-extended posture, etc.

original: rnams kyi dgod pa ni tshul rnam pa sna tshogs so //
analyzed: rnams kyi dgod pa ni tshul rnam pa sna tshogs so //
translated: The array is the various modes.

original: des yongs su bskor zhes sbrel lo //
analyzed: des yongs su bskor zhes sbrel lo //
translated: By that, he is surrounded, it is connected.

original: byed pa rnams kyang bdag gis rdo rje phreng bar rnam par spros so //
analyzed: byed pa rnams kyang bdag gis rdo rje phreng bar rnam par spros so //
translated: The postures also I have elaborated in the Vajra Garland.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'am rdo rje'i rnam par byed pa can gyi rkang pa ni rdo rje'i rkang pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'am rdo rje'i rnam par byed pa can gyi rkang pa ni rdo rje'i rkang pa'o //
translated: The feet marked with vajras or having the form of vajras are vajra feet.

original: gdug pa can thams cad skrag par bya'o zhes pa nye bar bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can thams cad skrag par bya'o zhes pa nye bar bsdus pa'o //
translated: All the wicked ones should be frightened, is the summary.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi dris byugs par ;
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi dris byugs par ;
translated: Then, the ground of the maṇḍala, having been anointed with cow dung,

original: me tog la sogs pa rnams dang gar dang glu la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa rnams dang gar dang glu la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas /
translated: having made offerings with flowers, etc., and with dance, song, etc.,

original: lag pas reg cing dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang yi ge brgyad pa lan bdun rnams yongs su bzlas te /
analyzed: lag pas reg cing dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang yi ge brgyad pa lan bdun rnams yongs su bzlas te /
translated: Having touched it with his hand, he should recite the mantra of the Lord of the maṇḍala one hundred and eight times, and the eight syllable mantra seven times.

original: de nyid du mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis nyal nas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid du mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis nyal nas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having slept there with his mind in equipoise, he will be protected.

original: de'i rjes su rab dang gur la sogs pa bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i rjes su rab dang gur la sogs pa bsgoms nas /
translated: After that, having meditated on the fence, the tent, and so forth,

original: khro bo'i gzugs su bsgoms pa'i seng lding la sogs pa'i phur bu rnams kyis sngar bzhin du bgegs rnams phur bus gdab pa dang brdung ba dag gis nye bar zhi bar byas nas so //
analyzed: khro bo'i gzugs su bsgoms pa'i seng lding la sogs pa'i phur bu rnams kyis sngar bzhin du bgegs rnams phur bus gdab pa dang brdung ba dag gis nye bar zhi bar byas nas so //
translated: he should pacify the obstructors with the kīla of the Khaṭvāṇga and so forth, which are meditated as having the form of the wrathful one, by means of the kīla and beating, as before.🔽Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa zhes pa po'i bar gnyis mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa zhes pa po'i bar gnyis mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: The two lines beginning with “then” are the brief presentation.

original: sngags zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sngags zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par bstan pa'o //
translated: The lines beginning with “the mantra” are the extensive presentation.

original: sngags kyis tshul nye bar phyin nas bklag par bya ba gang las yin pa de la phyag byas nas des rjes su gnang bas cho ga snga ma yang rjes su bsgrub po //
analyzed: sngags kyis tshul nye bar phyin nas bklag par bya ba gang las yin pa de la phyag byas nas des rjes su gnang bas cho ga snga ma yang rjes su bsgrub po //
translated: Having approached the method of the mantra, having bowed to that from which the recitation is, having been permitted by that, he should also accomplish the previous rite.

original: sa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor la bam yig las skyes pa bsams nas /
analyzed: sa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor la bam yig las skyes pa bsams nas /
translated: Having imagined the mandala of the earth goddess in the center of the ground on a mandala of fragrance from a vaṃ syllable,

original: ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs bkug ste de la gzhug go //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs bkug ste de la gzhug go //
translated: one should summon the form of the awareness being and cause it to enter.

original: sbyin sreg las zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin sreg las zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The phrase “rite of fire sacrifice” is an example.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi las kyang ngo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi las kyang ngo //
translated: The rite of the mandala is also [included].

original: des na de'i skabs su dkyil 'khor gyi las zhes brjod par bya ste ;
analyzed: des na de'i skabs su dkyil 'khor gyi las zhes brjod par bya ste ;
translated: Therefore, at that time, one should say “rite of the mandala.”

original: lhag par gnas pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par gnas pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “ Installation” and so forth.

original: de ltar ni ae hi ae hi zhes pas ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bo dgug pa rtogs par byas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni ae hi ae hi zhes pas ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bo dgug pa rtogs par byas so //
translated: Thus, “ehi ehi” is understood to summon the essence of the awareness being.

original: su sv'a dha ya zhes pa 'dis shugs kyis nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: su sv'a dha ya zhes pa 'dis shugs kyis nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: “ Svādhāya” by this [word] one is installed by implication.

original: thams cad kyis lhag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyis lhag par gnas pa'o //
translated: “ Sarva” is all.🔽“ Devī” is goddess.🔽“ Tadyathā” is thus.
