original: sa dag par bya'o zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis bsang gtor bya'i //
analyzed: sa dag par bya'o zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis bsang gtor bya'i //
translated: One should purify the ground means one should sprinkle it with the five nectars.

original: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni byug ces pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni byug ces pa'o //
translated: The extensive explanation of this is anoint.

original: yang dag par mchod nas ni me tog gi rnam pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: yang dag par mchod nas ni me tog gi rnam pa la sogs pas so //
translated: Having made a perfect offering, with flowers and so forth,

original: phyag rgya'i rig ma bzhag ste bdud rtsi gnyis kyi don du'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i rig ma bzhag ste bdud rtsi gnyis kyi don du'o //
translated: one should place the consort, the knowledge-woman, for the sake of the two nectars.

original: gdug pa zhes pa la sogs pa rjes su brjod nas lha mos zhu ba'o //
analyzed: gdug pa zhes pa la sogs pa rjes su brjod nas lha mos zhu ba'o //
translated: Having recited the fierce one and so forth, the goddess asks,

original: lugs ma ni gser la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: lugs ma ni gser la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The icon is made of gold and so forth.

original: 'dus byas pa ni gsar pa'i las kyis so //
analyzed: 'dus byas pa ni gsar pa'i las kyis so //
translated: The constructed one is made by new work.

original: zhes gsungs so zhes pa ni sdud par byed pa po'i tshig go //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so zhes pa ni sdud par byed pa po'i tshig go //
translated: This is said by the compiler.

original: thun mong zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: thun mong zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo //
translated: The common one is also for pacification and so forth.

original: yan lag ces mdor bstan nas rgyas par ston pa snying gar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag ces mdor bstan nas rgyas par ston pa snying gar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having taught the branches in brief, the extensive teaching is at the heart and so forth.

original: khros pa'i las la sngar gyi rjes su 'brang bas rig ma m'a ma k'i ru bsgom par bya'o zhes kyang rtogs par bya'o zhes pa 'di ltar las kyis dbye ba las so zhes pa 'dis mngon par dgongs so /
analyzed: khros pa'i las la sngar gyi rjes su 'brang bas rig ma m'a ma k'i ru bsgom par bya'o zhes kyang rtogs par bya'o zhes pa 'di ltar las kyis dbye ba las so zhes pa 'dis mngon par dgongs so /
translated: This is the intended meaning of the line “One should understand that the action is to be performed in this way.”

original: 'am ni sdud pa la'o //
analyzed: 'am ni sdud pa la'o //
translated: The word “or” has a conjunctive sense.

original: rdul dang khu ba de la byug pa'o //
analyzed: rdul dang khu ba de la byug pa'o //
translated: “Dust and fluid” refers to semen and blood.

original: 'du byed pa ni sa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: 'du byed pa ni sa rnams kyi'o //
translated: “Formations” refers to the stages.

original: de'i phyir nye bar sdud de /
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar sdud de /
translated: “Therefore” means that the two are gathered.

original: 'di ltar zhes pa'o //🔽sbyin sreg gi sa gzhi ni phyi rol te /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes pa'o // sbyin sreg gi sa gzhi ni phyi rol te /
translated: “In this way” refers to the above.

original: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The external ground of the fire sacrifice is the external maṇḍala ground.

original: nang gi sbyin sreg gi sa gzhi ni gsang ba'i padma ste /
analyzed: nang gi sbyin sreg gi sa gzhi ni gsang ba'i padma ste /
translated: The internal ground of the fire sacrifice is the secret lotus.

original: der sbyin sreg 'khor bcas ni nye bar gsum par brjod zin to //
analyzed: der sbyin sreg 'khor bcas ni nye bar gsum par brjod zin to //
translated: The fire sacrifice together with its retinue is described in the third chapter.

original: 'dir ni las kyi gtum mo'i mer mngon par dgongs so //
analyzed: 'dir ni las kyi gtum mo'i mer mngon par dgongs so //
translated: Here, the fire of the karma-uṣṇīṣa is intended.

original: de ni rdo rje dang chu skyes bsrubs pa las byung ba'i me ste /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje dang chu skyes bsrubs pa las byung ba'i me ste /
translated: That is the fire that arises from the friction of the vajra and the lotus.

original: las byed cing dge ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: las byed cing dge ba byed pa'o //
translated: It performs actions and creates virtue.

original: don dam par dge ba yang thar pa ste /
analyzed: don dam par dge ba yang thar pa ste /
translated: The ultimate virtue is liberation,

original: 'dzin pa'i tshogs tshar gcod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i tshogs tshar gcod pa'o //
translated: the destruction of the host of attachments.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gtum mo gsum po phan tshun rjes su mthun pa nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gtum mo gsum po phan tshun rjes su mthun pa nyid kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the three chandalis are only mutually compatible.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de kho na la mngon par bsams nas byang chub sems zhes pa la sogs pas 'grel pa gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de kho na la mngon par bsams nas byang chub sems zhes pa la sogs pas 'grel pa gsal bar byas so //
translated: Therefore, having reflected on that reality, the commentary is clarified by the words “bodhicitta,” etc.

original: 'o na ci dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang bu mo khyad par can ma yin nam zhe na gsungs pa dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang bu mo khyad par can ma yin nam zhe na gsungs pa dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: But is there not a special girl in the mandala rite? He says “mandala,” etc.

original: 'o na nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga la ni rig ma nye bar mkho mod //
analyzed: 'o na nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga la ni rig ma nye bar mkho mod //
translated: But in the rite of inner fire sacrifice, a knowledge woman is necessary.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la des ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la des ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the use of her in the mandala rite? He says:

original: dkyil 'khor @258b zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor @258b zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “mandala,” etc.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: lha tshim pa'i ched du sbyin sreg ste /
analyzed: lha tshim pa'i ched du sbyin sreg ste /
translated: The fire sacrifice is for the satisfaction of the gods.

original: de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor ba rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor ba rnams so //
translated: And they are the mandala deities.

original: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor med par sbyin sreg gi cho ga ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor med par sbyin sreg gi cho ga ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the rite of the fire sacrifice is not without a mandala.

original: de nye bar bsten pa'o //
analyzed: de nye bar bsten pa'o //
translated: It is in dependence on that.

original: gang du nang yin pa de la gsang ba ste /
analyzed: gang du nang yin pa de la gsang ba ste /
translated: In that which is inner, there is the secret.

original: nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams kyi ste byang chub sems rdo rje spro ba'i ngo bo can phung po la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang thig gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams kyi ste byang chub sems rdo rje spro ba'i ngo bo can phung po la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang thig gdab par bya ste /
translated: The mandala of the deities of the aggregates, etc., which have the nature of the emission of the vajra of the Thought of Enlightenment, the inner nature of phenomena, should be drawn with lines.

original: thun mong pa'i bu mo nye bar mkho ba'i cho ga 'dis so //
analyzed: thun mong pa'i bu mo nye bar mkho ba'i cho ga 'dis so //
translated: With this rite of the necessary young woman who is common to all.

original: thig gdab pa ni nyi shu gsum par /
analyzed: thig gdab pa ni nyi shu gsum par /
translated: The drawing of lines is explained in the Twenty-third Chapter:

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba /
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba /
translated: The delightful mandala of the body,

original: sgo bzhi zhes pa la sogs pas bshad zin to //
analyzed: sgo bzhi zhes pa la sogs pas bshad zin to //
translated: with four doors, etc.

original: 'o na dkyil 'khor 'di las sbyang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga ci ltar gsungs she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na dkyil 'khor 'di las sbyang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga ci ltar gsungs she na gsungs pa /
translated: Well then, how is the rite of purification, etc. taught in this mandala?🔽It is said:

original: rnam pa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The two kinds, etc.

original: ji snyed pa ni mtha' dag nyid la'o //
analyzed: ji snyed pa ni mtha' dag nyid la'o //
translated: As many as there are, in their entirety.

original: rang gi ba'i dam tshig ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs dag rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi ba'i dam tshig ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs dag rtogs pa'o //
translated: One's own commitment is the realization of the states of cause and effect.

original: gnas skabs gnyis ka yang rtog pa ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor blang bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gnas skabs gnyis ka yang rtog pa ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor blang bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: In both cases, the meaning is that one should take up the maṇḍala of the Dharma.

original: 'di'i rjes su 'brang ba las ni gdul bya'i dbang las thabs kyi yan lag nyid kyis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: 'di'i rjes su 'brang ba las ni gdul bya'i dbang las thabs kyi yan lag nyid kyis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: From the perspective of the disciples, the maṇḍala of colored powder is a branch of the method.

original: de dang rab tu 'brel pa phyi'i sbyin sreg kyang ngo //
analyzed: de dang rab tu 'brel pa phyi'i sbyin sreg kyang ngo //
translated: It is also external fire sacrifice, which is related to that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pa zhes te /
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pa zhes te /
translated: Thus, the yogī

original: nang gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
translated: is endowed with inner yoga.

original: gnas ni gsang ba'i gnas lte ba'o //
analyzed: gnas ni gsang ba'i gnas lte ba'o //
translated: The place is the secret place, the navel.

original: thab kyang ste lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thab kyang ste lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is also the hearth, because it is said that “in the maṇḍala of the navel.”

original: de nyid gnas te /
analyzed: de nyid gnas te /
translated: That itself is the place.

original: de dang mnyam par mos pa ni der gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de dang mnyam par mos pa ni der gyur pa ste /
translated: Imagining it to be equal to that, it becomes that,

original: phar gyur pa bzhin no //
analyzed: phar gyur pa bzhin no //
translated: like becoming a father.

original: ci ltar las thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar las thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is asked how it accomplishes all activities, it is said:

original: ma'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The mother” and so on.

original: ni ste gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ni ste gang gi phyir /
translated: Since that is so,

original: me la gang rnams kyi zhal yin pa de rnams ni de skad do /
analyzed: me la gang rnams kyi zhal yin pa de rnams ni de skad do /
translated: Those who are the faces of the fire are called that.

original: sbyin sreg de nyid la ni sbyin sreg gi rang bzhin la ste /
analyzed: sbyin sreg de nyid la ni sbyin sreg gi rang bzhin la ste /
translated: In that very fire sacrifice, the nature of the fire sacrifice,

original: de'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i don du'o //
translated: for that purpose.

original: srubs pa ni bsrub shing ngo //
analyzed: srubs pa ni bsrub shing ngo //
translated: The churning stick is the churning stick.

original: mi dge ba ni sngon spyod la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba ni sngon spyod la sogs pa'o //
translated: The unwholesome is the preliminary practice, etc.

original: kha ran ni kha khyer ro //
analyzed: kha ran ni kha khyer ro //
translated: The rim is the edge.

original: de'i phyi rol gyi zur rnams su khro bo'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ni mngon spyod kyi thab khung du'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol gyi zur rnams su khro bo'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ni mngon spyod kyi thab khung du'o //
translated: In the corners outside of that, the wrathful three-pointed vajra is in the hearth for destroying.

original: zhi ba la 'khor lo'am rdo rje rtse gsum pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhi ba la 'khor lo'am rdo rje rtse gsum pa rnams so //
translated: In the pacifying, the wheels or three-pointed vajras.

original: rgyas pa la rin po che rnams so //
analyzed: rgyas pa la rin po che rnams so //
translated: In the enriching, the jewels.

original: dbang du bya ba la chu skyes dmar pos mtshan pa'i lcags kyu @259a * //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba la chu skyes dmar pos mtshan pa'i lcags kyu @259a * //
translated: In the enthralling, the hooks marked with red lotuses.

original: rnams so // las thams cad pa la ral gri rnams sam sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so //
analyzed: rnams so // las thams cad pa la ral gri rnams sam sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so //
translated: In all activities, the swords or crossed vajras.

original: zhi ba'i thab dang 'dra ba khyad par dang bcas pa ni las thams cad pa'i thab tu yang 'dir shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'i thab dang 'dra ba khyad par dang bcas pa ni las thams cad pa'i thab tu yang 'dir shes par bya'o //
translated: The hearth for all activities should be understood here as similar to the pacifying hearth, with the difference.

original: gtsug tor ni 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor ni 'khor lo'o //
translated: The crown is the wheel.

original: thab khung gi dbus su las dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan ma re re ste /
analyzed: thab khung gi dbus su las dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan ma re re ste /
translated: In the middle of the hearth, each sign that is in accordance with the rite.

original: las rnams thams cad la mtshan ma bzhi'i nang du byas pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtso bo'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad la mtshan ma bzhi'i nang du byas pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtso bo'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: In all rites, the sign of the principal deity that is in accordance with the rite is made in the four directions.

original: sbyin sreg cas pa /
analyzed: sbyin sreg cas pa /
translated: Having made the oblation

original: sbyin sreg gi rang bzhin gyi cho ga shes pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi rang bzhin gyi cho ga shes pa'o //
translated: means knowing the rite that has the nature of oblation.

original: ji ltar rigs par shes pa las dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyogs su'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par shes pa las dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyogs su'o //
translated: In the proper way means in the direction that is in accordance with the rite.

original: dgang gzar yang mar gyis bkang zhing /
analyzed: dgang gzar yang mar gyis bkang zhing /
translated: The ladle is filled with ghee.

original: de ltar gyur pa de dag gis //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa de dag gis //
translated: Having made that,

original: dgang gzar gyi khar blugs gzar gyi kha bzhag nas dgang blugs so //
analyzed: dgang gzar gyi khar blugs gzar gyi kha bzhag nas dgang blugs so //
translated: the ladle and the spoon means having placed the spoon on the edge of the ladle, the ladle and the spoon.

original: sbyin sreg yo byad ni bsreg bya'i bud shing la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin sreg yo byad ni bsreg bya'i bud shing la sogs pa'o //
translated: The oblation materials are the fuel to be burned, and so on.

original: chu ni las thams cad pa'o //
analyzed: chu ni las thams cad pa'o //
translated: The water is for all rites.

original: drag po'i las ni g-yas pa ro //
analyzed: drag po'i las ni g-yas pa ro //
translated: The fierce rite is on the right.

original: las thams cad pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags te /🔽des bzlas pa'i chu'o //
analyzed: las thams cad pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags te / des bzlas pa'i chu'o //
translated: The rite for all activities is the mantra of Amṛtakuṇḍali.🔽The water is enchanted with that.

original: des bsang gtor te /
analyzed: des bsang gtor te /
translated: With that, sprinkle means

original: sbyin sreg bya ba la sogs pa dang lha la yang gtor ma dang zhal bsil lo //
analyzed: sbyin sreg bya ba la sogs pa dang lha la yang gtor ma dang zhal bsil lo //
translated: One should also offer oblations to the deity, and a face-washing.

original: ku sha'i rtse mo rnams kyis kun du phyogs rnams su phyi ma dang nang g-yogs nas thab khung dgab par bya'o //
analyzed: ku sha'i rtse mo rnams kyis kun du phyogs rnams su phyi ma dang nang g-yogs nas thab khung dgab par bya'o //
translated: One should cover the hearth with the tips of the kuśa grass, facing outward and inward.

original: de nas cho ga bzhin zhes pa lha'i bdag nyid kyis rang gi lha'i sa bon gyis thab khung bskyed de /
analyzed: de nas cho ga bzhin zhes pa lha'i bdag nyid kyis rang gi lha'i sa bon gyis thab khung bskyed de /
translated: Then, “as prescribed,” one should generate the hearth with the seed syllable of one’s deity, in the form of the deity.

original: me 'bar bar rig nas /
analyzed: me 'bar bar rig nas /
translated: Having recognized the fire as blazing,

original: de'i dbus su bdag med par dmigs la /
analyzed: de'i dbus su bdag med par dmigs la /
translated: one should visualize it as being without a self.

original: ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum par /
analyzed: ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum par /
translated: In the middle of the fire, which is triangular and arises from the syllable raṃ,

original: padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa ram yig las byung ba'am yud kyis rdzogs pa'i me'i lha bsgoms te /
analyzed: padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa ram yig las byung ba'am yud kyis rdzogs pa'i me'i lha bsgoms te /
translated: one should visualize the fire god, who arises from the syllable raṃ on a lotus and sun, or who is instantly complete.

original: dam tshig sems dpa'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus nam mkhar ye shes sems dpa' me lha me'i phyogs nas byon pa /
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus nam mkhar ye shes sems dpa' me lha me'i phyogs nas byon pa /
translated: One should visualize the wisdom being fire god, who has come from the direction of fire, with the hook of light rays from the seed syllable in the heart of the pledge being.

original: drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bltas nas /
analyzed: drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bltas nas /
translated: He is surrounded by a host of sages.

original: 'bod pa'i tshul gyis g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa'i mthe bong bskyod cing dgug par bya ste /
analyzed: 'bod pa'i tshul gyis g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa'i mthe bong bskyod cing dgug par bya ste /
translated: With the manner of calling, shake the right hand's thumb of the mudra of fearlessness and summon.🔽

original: aom ae hi zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: aom ae hi zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: With the manner of calling, one should beckon with the thumb of the right fear not hand, with Oṃ ehi ehi... and so forth.

original: ha bya ma ni gang lha rnams la sbyin par bya ba ste ka bya ma ni gang lha rnams pa'o //
analyzed: ha bya ma ni gang lha rnams la sbyin par bya ba ste ka bya ma ni gang lha rnams pa'o //
translated: The ha is what is to be given to the gods, and the ka is what is to be taken from the gods.

original: phar gyur pa yang me lha ste /
analyzed: phar gyur pa yang me lha ste /
translated: The opposite is the fire god,

original: sgrub pa po'i sgrub pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i sgrub pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he generates the situation of the practitioner's desired accomplishment.

original: bsang gtor bya ste /
analyzed: bsang gtor bya ste /
translated: One should offer the oblation,

original: ku sha'i rtse mos bzung ba ni las thams cad pa'i chu yis so //
analyzed: ku sha'i rtse mos bzung ba ni las thams cad pa'i chu yis so //
translated: with water for all activities, held with the tip of kuśa grass.

original: @259b spyan gsum pa ni zhal so so la'o //
analyzed: @259b spyan gsum pa ni zhal so so la'o //
translated: The three eyes are on each face.

original: sbom zhing thung ba nag po dang ser po dang dkar po dang g-yas dang nub dang byang gi zhal can no //
analyzed: sbom zhing thung ba nag po dang ser po dang dkar po dang g-yas dang nub dang byang gi zhal can no //
translated: The faces are black, yellow, white, right, west, and north, thick and short.

original: gzhug par bya ba ni dam tshig sems dpa' la ro gcig tu gyur pas so //
analyzed: gzhug par bya ba ni dam tshig sems dpa' la ro gcig tu gyur pas so //
translated: One should introduce the pledge-being and the awareness-being into a single taste.

original: sreg blugs ni dgang blugs so //
analyzed: sreg blugs ni dgang blugs so //
translated: The oblation is the ladle.

original: de'i rjes su thams cad de til dang 'bras la sogs pa rnams rang nyid ji lta ba'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg kho na ni thams cad kyi sbyin sreg ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes su thams cad de til dang 'bras la sogs pa rnams rang nyid ji lta ba'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg kho na ni thams cad kyi sbyin sreg ste /
translated: After that, all of them, sesame, rice, etc., are just the self-mantra's homa.

original: de byas nas so //
analyzed: de byas nas so //
translated: Having done that,

original: yongs su bsgyur ro ni me lha'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsgyur ro ni me lha'o //
translated: one should transform the fire god.

original: sbyor ba'i rim pa ni dam tshig sems dpa' la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang / dgang blugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i rim pa ni dam tshig sems dpa' la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang / dgang blugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sequence of the rite is the entry of the gnosis being into the commitment being, and the ladle, etc.

original: lha rnams ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa las rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha rnams ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa las rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The deities are Vairochana, etc., in accordance with the karma of pacification, etc.

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub ces pa mngon par bsams pa'i dngos grub po //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub ces pa mngon par bsams pa'i dngos grub po //
translated: The desired power is the power one has in mind.

original: de nas bgegs med pa dang bgegs dang bcas pa'i me mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshon par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas bgegs med pa dang bgegs dang bcas pa'i me mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshon par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Then, one should indicate the signs of the fire, with and without obstacles.

original: gdugs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gdugs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said: Parasol, etc., and so on.

original: gdugs la sogs pa'i rol pas 'bar ba rnams ni rab tu bsngags so //
analyzed: gdugs la sogs pa'i rol pas 'bar ba rnams ni rab tu bsngags so //
translated: The blazing with the parasol, etc., is praised.

original: rtse mo gsum pa ni tha ma'o //
analyzed: rtse mo gsum pa ni tha ma'o //
translated: The three-peaked is the last.

original: g-yas skor du 'bar ba ni mchog tu mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas skor du 'bar ba ni mchog tu mtshon pa'o //
translated: The clockwise flame is the supreme.

original: me lce mang ba zhes pa la sogs pas bgegs mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: me lce mang ba zhes pa la sogs pas bgegs mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: The many flames, etc., indicate the obstructors.

original: brtson pa zhes pa drug pa'i don la'o //
analyzed: brtson pa zhes pa drug pa'i don la'o //
translated: The diligent one is in the sixth case.

original: aom yig sv'a h'a mtha' zhes pa ni rang gi sngags kyi yi ge'i mthar /🔽zhi ba la sh'a ntim ku ru sv'a h'a dang / rgyas pa la rgyas par gyis shig aom /
analyzed: aom yig sv'a h'a mtha' zhes pa ni rang gi sngags kyi yi ge'i mthar / zhi ba la sh'a ntim ku ru sv'a h'a dang / rgyas pa la rgyas par gyis shig aom /
translated: The syllable OṀ at the end, etc., is at the end of one's mantra syllable.🔽For pacification, add ŚĀNTIṂ KURU SVĀHĀ; for increase, add PUṢṬIM KURU SVĀHĀ;

original: dbang du bya ba la pa sham ku ru ho: dgug pa la dgug par gyis shig dza: zhes spel nas glu dbyangs kyis yi ge bar ma chad par sngags bzlas so //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba la pa sham ku ru ho: dgug pa la dgug par gyis shig dza: zhes spel nas glu dbyangs kyis yi ge bar ma chad par sngags bzlas so //
translated: for enthrallment, add VAŚAṂ KURU HOḤ; for summoning, add ĀKṚṢYAṂ KURU HŪṂ.

original: drag po la ni m'a ra ya h'um yang na phat ces spel nas brjod pa dang yi ge bar ma chad par sngags bzlas so //
analyzed: drag po la ni m'a ra ya h'um yang na phat ces spel nas brjod pa dang yi ge bar ma chad par sngags bzlas so //
translated: For wrath, add MARAYA HŪṂ or PHAṬ.

original: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sngags la sogs pa 'di byin gyis rlob pa po'i lha rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sngags la sogs pa 'di byin gyis rlob pa po'i lha rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: The mantras for the rites of pacification, etc., are the deities Vairocana, etc., of the one who is consecrating.

original: de rnams ji ltar rigs par bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams ji ltar rigs par bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship them with various kinds of offerings, as appropriate.

original: de nas de rnams mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi ched du ji ltar rigs par skul ba'i tshig gis bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de rnams mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi ched du ji ltar rigs par skul ba'i tshig gis bskul bar bya'o //
translated: Then, for the sake of the desired powers, one should incite them with the appropriate words of incitement.

original: ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is that? It is stated:

original: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: All, etc.

original: las de thams cad sreg blugs la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyis dang de las skyes pa'i dge ba rnams kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i @260a * //
analyzed: las de thams cad sreg blugs la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyis dang de las skyes pa'i dge ba rnams kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i @260a * //
translated: All those actions are expanded by the others, such as the burnt offerings, and by the virtues born from them.

original: bsam pa'o // cho ga 'di thams cad kyang sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid kyis khyad par can bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam pa'o // cho ga 'di thams cad kyang sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid kyis khyad par can bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The intention is that all of these rites should be accomplished with the special nature of the burnt offering.

original: sbyin sreg 'khor dang bcas pa'i de kho na nyid ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa de nyid de /
analyzed: sbyin sreg 'khor dang bcas pa'i de kho na nyid ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa de nyid de /
translated: The reality of the burnt offering together with its retinue is the oneness with emptiness.

original: de'i phyir sbyin sreg mkhan po dang bsreg bya dang sbyin sreg sbyin pa'i lha la sogs pa rnams sgyu ma nyid du mos pa kho nas ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga ni yang dag par mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyin sreg mkhan po dang bsreg bya dang sbyin sreg sbyin pa'i lha la sogs pa rnams sgyu ma nyid du mos pa kho nas ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga ni yang dag par mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Therefore, the priest who performs the sacrifice, the victim, the deity to whom the sacrifice is offered, and so on, by merely imagining them to be illusion-like, the rite as explained is the cause of the perfection of the desired result.

original: bshad ces pa la sogs pa ni drag po'i las la'o //
analyzed: bshad ces pa la sogs pa ni drag po'i las la'o //
translated: The words and so on refer to the violent rite.

original: zhi ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg thams cad kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg thams cad kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu pa'o //
translated: The words by all the sacrifices of pacification and so on and so forth is a summary.

original: de las mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed de zhes pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'i lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de las mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed de zhes pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'i lhag ma'o //
translated: The words he accomplishes the desired result from that is a summary remainder.

original: zhi ba la sogs pa 'di rnams la ji skad bshad pa las gzhan pa'i las so so ni khyad par dang bcas pa bdag gis 'od kyi snye mar gsal bar bya'o zhes pas 'dir ma spros so //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa 'di rnams la ji skad bshad pa las gzhan pa'i las so so ni khyad par dang bcas pa bdag gis 'od kyi snye mar gsal bar bya'o zhes pas 'dir ma spros so //
translated: I will clarify in the Light Rays of the Moon the individual rites other than those explained here for these pacifications and so on, along with their distinctions, and so I will not elaborate on them here.

original: bshad pa'i sa sbyang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par dang de rnams kyis gsal bar byas pa thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang / rab gnas kyi cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje'i phreng bar rgyas par byas so //
analyzed: bshad pa'i sa sbyang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par dang de rnams kyis gsal bar byas pa thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang / rab gnas kyi cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje'i phreng bar rgyas par byas so //
translated: The special features of the ground-purification, etc. of the explanation, and the rite of the layout, etc. which are clarified by those, and the rite of installation, are extensively set forth in the Vajravali Mandala Rite.

original: 'dir ni rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga gtso bo'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga gtso bo'o //
translated: Here, the rite of installation is the main one.

original: de sngon ma can las rab 'byam sgrub pa'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de sngon ma can las rab 'byam sgrub pa'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated for the sake of accomplishing the extensive ritual action of one who has previously done it,

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: as in the passage beginning with “Then, etc.”

original: / rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: / rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Vairochana, the Great Vajra, is the Vajra-Holder.

original: ye shes kyi 'khor lo ni ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'khor lo ni ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The wisdom wheel is the mandala of the wisdom-being.

original: de'i sgrub byed ni dam tshig sems dpa' dang lhan cig ro gcig par byed pa rdo rje ste mi phyed pa gang du yin pa de ni de skad do //
analyzed: de'i sgrub byed ni dam tshig sems dpa' dang lhan cig ro gcig par byed pa rdo rje ste mi phyed pa gang du yin pa de ni de skad do //
translated: That which is the vajra, the indivisible, where the practitioner of that is made one taste with the pledge-being, is so-called.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrub byed kyi ched du sbyor ba ni bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrub byed kyi ched du sbyor ba ni bsgrub pa ste /
translated: The performance is the application for the sake of accomplishing the maṇḍala of all the maṇḍalas of Vairocana, etc.

original: des zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams rab 'byam gsal bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: des zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams rab 'byam gsal bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By that, the extensive rites of pacification, etc. are clearly accomplished.

original: gang su zhig ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gzhag pa de'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: gang su zhig ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gzhag pa de'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: Whoever, Vairocana, etc. is placed as the principal of the maṇḍala, his maṇḍala

original: rnam par snang mdzad 'byung ba rdo rje zhes pa la sogs par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad 'byung ba rdo rje zhes pa la sogs par brjod par bya ste /
translated: should be described as the “Vairocana origination vajra,” etc.🔽Vairocana, etc. manifestly arise here as the principal ones.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'dir gtso bor mngon par 'byung ngo zhes pa dang de bzhin du rdo rje ste mi tshugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'dir gtso bor mngon par 'byung ngo zhes pa dang de bzhin du rdo rje ste mi tshugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes byas nas so //
translated: And likewise, the vajra is so called because of being invincible.

original: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa dbus su 'khor @260b lo'i dbang por 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i bdag po'i gnas su dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa dbus su 'khor @260b lo'i dbang por 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i bdag po'i gnas su dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: When someone other than the tathāgatas becomes the central deity of the maṇḍala, then the central tathāgata is in the place of the lord of that maṇḍala.

original: de'i bdag po ni de'i spyi bor ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag po ni de'i spyi bor ro //
translated: Its lord is on its crown.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' kho na lhag pa'i bdag por gzhag mod /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' kho na lhag pa'i bdag por gzhag mod /
translated: Indeed, Vajrasattva is established as the lord of the rest.

original: gzhan rnams kyis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the function of the others?

original: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o /
analyzed: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o /
translated: It is said:

original: 'khor lo can dang ye shes dag ste ;
analyzed: 'khor lo can dang ye shes dag ste ;
translated: The wheel-holders, the pristine wisdoms,🔽the commitment and pristine wisdom beings,

original: dam tshig dang ye shes sems dpa' dag rnam par bsgoms pa rnams kho na mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi ched du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: dam tshig dang ye shes sems dpa' dag rnam par bsgoms pa rnams kho na mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi ched du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni /
translated: who are contemplated, are definitely applied to Vairochana, etc.,🔽as lords of these, for the sake of the desired powers.

original: 'di rnams kyi bdag po nyid du nges par sbyor ro zhes pa nges par sbyor ba rnams te /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi bdag po nyid du nges par sbyor ro zhes pa nges par sbyor ba rnams te /
translated: They are the applications.🔽They perform the functions of pacification, etc.

original: de rnams kyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed do zhes pa ni bdag po gzhan nyid kyi dgod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed do zhes pa ni bdag po gzhan nyid kyi dgod pa'o //
translated: This is the establishment of the other lords.

original: dbang po mchog gi sems can la ni rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po nyid kho nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rab 'byam mtha' dag 'grub bo //
analyzed: dbang po mchog gi sems can la ni rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po nyid kho nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rab 'byam mtha' dag 'grub bo //
translated: For the supreme beings, Vajrasattva alone, by his very nature as lord, accomplishes the entire range of functions of pacification, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de las cig shos dang / de la dgongs nas mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla mar /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de las cig shos dang / de la dgongs nas mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla mar /
translated: Therefore, it is the other one, and with that in mind, the Tantra of the Highest Continuum of Expression says:🔽Buddhas, bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro bo dang ni rigs kyi yum //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro bo dang ni rigs kyi yum //
translated: wrathful ones, and the consorts of the families,🔽Marīci, Cundā,

original: 'od zer can dang tsund'a dang // shes rab pha rol phyin sogs rnams //
analyzed: 'od zer can dang tsund'a dang // shes rab pha rol phyin sogs rnams //
translated: Prajñāpāramitā, and so forth

original: ji ltar 'dod par bsgom pa yis //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod par bsgom pa yis //
translated: are meditated on as desired.

original: dbus kyis gtso bor brtags pa ste //
analyzed: dbus kyis gtso bor brtags pa ste //
translated: The central one is imagined to be the principal one.

original: dngos po gang dang gang gis ni //
analyzed: dngos po gang dang gang gis ni //
translated: Whatever things

original: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor //
translated: are applied to the minds of people,

original: de yis de yi rang bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis de yi rang bzhin 'gyur //
translated: they become the nature of that.

original: sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin //
translated: Like a jewel with various forms.

original: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni /
translated: Or, Vajrasattva

original: sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba'i gzhi //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba'i gzhi //
translated: is the basis of migrating beings with various forms.

original: kun mkhyen thams cad byed pa kun //
analyzed: kun mkhyen thams cad byed pa kun //
translated: The omniscient one, the creator of all,

original: kun la khyab pa bde ba che //
analyzed: kun la khyab pa bde ba che //
translated: is all-pervading, great bliss.

original: zhes phyogs gnyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes phyogs gnyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus, two positions are stated.

original: de la dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la phal cher mthu phul du byung ba gsal bar byas pa nyid kyis na sgrol ma bdag po nyid du sgom pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la phal cher mthu phul du byung ba gsal bar byas pa nyid kyis na sgrol ma bdag po nyid du sgom pa gsungs pa /
translated: In that, the meditation on Tara as the Lord is taught, by the clear manifestation of the most excellent power in the rites of subjugation, etc.

original: bsgom par bya zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The verse beginning with meditating teaches this.

original: bha ga'i dbus su ni chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par ro //
analyzed: bha ga'i dbus su ni chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par ro //
translated: In the center of the bhaga, in the center of the source of phenomena, in the mansion.

original: do shal la sogs pa ni mi'i rus pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: do shal la sogs pa ni mi'i rus pa las byung ba'o //
translated: The necklace, etc. are made of human bone.

original: sna tshogs rgyan rnams ni mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan rnams ni mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The various ornaments are the garland of fresh heads, etc.

original: skabs gsum bdag po ni dbang po ste des so //
analyzed: skabs gsum bdag po ni dbang po ste des so //
translated: The Lord of the three worlds is Indra, by him.

original: de rnams kyis skrag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyis skrag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are frightened of her.

original: kun nas skug pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: kun nas skug pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang /
translated: Even Brahma, etc. are terrified all around.

original: gang la thal mo sbyar bar byas pa de ni @261a * //
analyzed: gang la thal mo sbyar bar byas pa de ni @261a * //
translated: To whom he joins his palms in reverence, she is called the one to whom Brahma, etc. join their palms in reverence.

original: de skad do //
analyzed: de skad do //
translated: This is what it says.

original: 'dis ni thal mo sbyar bar byas pa'i bdud bzhi mnan pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni thal mo sbyar bar byas pa'i bdud bzhi mnan pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: This teaches that the four Maras are suppressed by the one to whom the palms are joined in reverence.

original: gang las mchog ste khyad par du 'phags pa ci yang med pa de ni mchog med do //
analyzed: gang las mchog ste khyad par du 'phags pa ci yang med pa de ni mchog med do //
translated: That which is not supreme, that is, which is not at all superior, is asuprema.

original: rnam par gtsigs pa ni sgeg pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par gtsigs pa ni sgeg pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The frowning is because of the very nature of the proud.

original: cher gtsigs pa ni gdug pa can skrag par byed pa lhur len pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: cher gtsigs pa ni gdug pa can skrag par byed pa lhur len pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The greatly frowning is because of the very nature of the fierce, which is intent on terrifying.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'jigs su rung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'jigs su rung ba'o //
translated: For that very reason, it is terrible.

original: steng gi zhal zhes pa dang po'i zhal gyi steng du gnyis pa bong bu'i rnam pa nyid na yang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs can no //
analyzed: steng gi zhal zhes pa dang po'i zhal gyi steng du gnyis pa bong bu'i rnam pa nyid na yang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs can no //
translated: The upper face is the second face, which is above the first face, and although it is the form of a donkey, it is pleasing.

original: rtse gsum ni g-yas logs su'o //
analyzed: rtse gsum ni g-yas logs su'o //
translated: The trident is on the right side.

original: sgrol ma 'di'i ming du bya ba he ru ka'i zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sgrol ma 'di'i ming du bya ba he ru ka'i zhes pa'o //
translated: The name of this Tara is Heruka.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di ni he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i gnas su bdag po nyid du bsgom par bya zhing /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di ni he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i gnas su bdag po nyid du bsgom par bya zhing /
translated: This Bhagavati is to be meditated upon as the mistress in the place of the sixteen-armed Heruka,

original: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i khyad par bsgom pa yang de lta kho na'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i khyad par bsgom pa yang de lta kho na'o //
translated: and the meditation on the special deities of the mandala is just like that.

original: 'di ni rgyud 'dir pra se na'i sgrol ma zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyud 'dir pra se na'i sgrol ma zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is called Prasena Tara in this tantra.

original: gzhan yang 'di gcig pu yang bsgom par bya ba /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di gcig pu yang bsgom par bya ba /
translated: Moreover, this alone is to be cultivated.

original: de'i tshe rang gi snying gar padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i t'am yig sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa mdun du yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de'i tshe rang gi snying gar padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i t'am yig sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa mdun du yang dag par mchod de /
translated: At that time, one should invite the seed syllable TAM, which is located on a moon in one's heart on a lotus, with light rays from the seed syllable, and make perfect offerings in front.

original: ji srid btang snyoms kyi bar du bsgoms nas /🔽aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'a tma ko& ham /
analyzed: ji srid btang snyoms kyi bar du bsgoms nas / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'a tma ko& ham /
translated: Having meditated on it up to equanimity,🔽one should recite:🔽Oṃ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'haṃ.

original: zhes pas stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su /
analyzed: zhes pas stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su /
translated: After emptiness,

original: chos 'byung gi nang sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la t'am las skyes pa'i autpala dang bcas pa'i t'am yongs su gyur pa las bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa bsams te /
analyzed: chos 'byung gi nang sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la t'am las skyes pa'i autpala dang bcas pa'i t'am yongs su gyur pa las bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa bsams te /
translated: one should imagine that from the syllable TAM, which is born from the syllable TAM, together with a lotus and moon in a phenomena source, one stands on the four demons,

original: g-yon pas dbang po mnan zhing /
analyzed: g-yon pas dbang po mnan zhing /
translated: pressing on Indra with the left foot,

original: g-yas pas nye dbang dang zhabs gnyis kyi dbus su drag po dang tshangs pa dag go //
analyzed: g-yas pas nye dbang dang zhabs gnyis kyi dbus su drag po dang tshangs pa dag go //
translated: and on Upendra with the right foot, and in the middle of the two feet, on Rudra and Brahmā.

original: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i ye shes kyi lha mo bcug pa las ro gcig tu gyur pa mchog gi thugs rje dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du shin tu yun ring bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i ye shes kyi lha mo bcug pa las ro gcig tu gyur pa mchog gi thugs rje dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du shin tu yun ring bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the goddess of pristine awareness, summoned by light rays from the seed syllable at the heart, enters and becomes of one taste with the drop, and that the drop becomes the nature of supreme compassion and wisdom, and remains for a very long time.

original: de'i rjes su dang ba'i sgrol ma'i sngags bzlas te mngon par 'dod par byed do //
analyzed: de'i rjes su dang ba'i sgrol ma'i sngags bzlas te mngon par 'dod par byed do //
translated: After that, one should recite the mantra of the delighted Tārā and accomplish one’s desires.

original: 'di lta bu'i rnam pa'i rim pa ni phyi ma la yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i rnam pa'i rim pa ni phyi ma la yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This process of visualization should be understood for the following [deities] as well.

original: sa bon la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The divisions of the seed syllables and so forth will be explained.

original: du ba ni cung zad dmar ba'i nag po'o //
analyzed: du ba ni cung zad dmar ba'i nag po'o //
translated: The smoke is black with a tinge of red.

original: 'jam pa'i gzugs can ni 'jam pa'i dpal shin tu ser ba cung zad khros pa /
analyzed: 'jam pa'i gzugs can ni 'jam pa'i dpal shin tu ser ba cung zad khros pa /
translated: The gentle form is Mañjuśrī, very yellow and slightly wrathful.

original: phyag zung gis rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa /
analyzed: phyag zung gis rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa /
translated: He holds a vajra and a vajra-bell with his two hands.

original: zhal gcig pa'o //
analyzed: zhal gcig pa'o //
translated: He has one face.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las zhes pa de'i steng gi h'um yig @261b las so //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las zhes pa de'i steng gi h'um yig @261b las so //
translated: “From the sun maṇḍala” means from the syllable hūṃ above it.

original: rdo rje ni shes rab nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni shes rab nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: The vajra is wisdom itself.

original: 'jigs byed ni thabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jigs byed ni thabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Bhairava is the method itself.

original: shin tu yang drag cing 'jigs par byed pa nyid ni thugs rje kho nas so //
analyzed: shin tu yang drag cing 'jigs par byed pa nyid ni thugs rje kho nas so //
translated: It is extremely fierce and frightening, only out of compassion.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:🔽The one with a body equal to the great lake

original: nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i mtsho chen dang // mnyam pa'i sku can thugs rje'i bdag nyid gang //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i mtsho chen dang // mnyam pa'i sku can thugs rje'i bdag nyid gang //
translated: heated by the sun's rays, the lord of compassion,

original: nang du ba mo lta bur bsil yin kyang //
analyzed: nang du ba mo lta bur bsil yin kyang //
translated: is cool like a mist inside,

original: phyi rol kho na 'gro bar rtsub par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi rol kho na 'gro bar rtsub par 'gyur //
translated: but is only rough to the world outside.

original: zhes so // de'i phyir stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni rdo rje 'jigs byed do //
analyzed: zhes so // de'i phyir stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni rdo rje 'jigs byed do //
translated: Therefore, the thought of awakening, which is the inseparability of emptiness and compassion, is Vajrabhairava.

original: ma he'i gzugs can zhes pa rtsa ba'i zhal la ste /
analyzed: ma he'i gzugs can zhes pa rtsa ba'i zhal la ste /
translated: The form of a buffalo is on the main face, and the faces of a pig, a horse, a donkey, a camel, a dog, and an elephant are on the right and left sides, respectively.

original: sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can //
analyzed: sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can //
translated: He has a snake-diadem and a garland of skulls.

original: tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag po dang nyi ma dang gzhon nu la sogs pa kha sbub tu zhabs 'og tu lhung ba rnams 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //🔽rva g-yas par te /
analyzed: tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag po dang nyi ma dang gzhon nu la sogs pa kha sbub tu zhabs 'og tu lhung ba rnams 'jigs par mdzad pa'o // rva g-yas par te /
translated: He frightens Brahma, Indra, Upendra, Rudra, Surya, Kumara, and so forth, who fall face down at his feet.🔽 On the right horn,

original: de'i g-yas logs su'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yas logs su'o //
translated: on the right side of that,

original: g-yon du ste rva g-yon pa'i g-yon logs su'o //
analyzed: g-yon du ste rva g-yon pa'i g-yon logs su'o //
translated: On the left, on the left side of the left horn.

original: bhi nd'i p'a la ni mdung thung gi rnam pa can rtse mo la chags pa'i rma bya'i sgro mdongs can no //
analyzed: bhi nd'i p'a la ni mdung thung gi rnam pa can rtse mo la chags pa'i rma bya'i sgro mdongs can no //
translated: The Bhinḍipāla is shaped like a javelin, with a peacock feather attached to the tip.

original: ka na ya ni mdung phyed pa'o //
analyzed: ka na ya ni mdung phyed pa'o //
translated: The Kanayani is a half-javelin.

original: phub kyi gnas su phub chung zhes pa kha cig tu 'don to //
analyzed: phub kyi gnas su phub chung zhes pa kha cig tu 'don to //
translated: In the place of the shield, some editions read “small shield.”

original: rkang pa ni mi'i'o //
analyzed: rkang pa ni mi'i'o //
translated: The feet are human.

original: lag pa yang mi'i'o //
analyzed: lag pa yang mi'i'o //
translated: The hands are also human.

original: kham phor ni btung ba'i snod kyi thod pa'o //
analyzed: kham phor ni btung ba'i snod kyi thod pa'o //
translated: The bowl is the top of a drinking vessel.

original: ne tso'i gnas su seng ge zhes kha cig tu 'don to //
analyzed: ne tso'i gnas su seng ge zhes kha cig tu 'don to //
translated: In the place of the parrot, some editions read “lion.”

original: khra ni bong khra'o //
analyzed: khra ni bong khra'o //
translated: The hawk is a donkey-hawk.

original: mantr'i ni khyim bya'o //
analyzed: mantr'i ni khyim bya'o //
translated: The Mantri is a house-sparrow.

original: bya chen po ni mgo dang mchu dkar ba'i 'ol ba'o //🔽zhabs g-yas pa brgyad kyi 'og tu mi la sogs pa brgyad rnams so //
analyzed: bya chen po ni mgo dang mchu dkar ba'i 'ol ba'o // zhabs g-yas pa brgyad kyi 'og tu mi la sogs pa brgyad rnams so //
translated: The great bird is a swan with a white head and beak.🔽Under the eight right feet are the eight, Man and so forth.

original: g-yon pa'i zhabs brgyad kyi 'og rnams su bya rgod la sogs pa brgyad rnams so //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i zhabs brgyad kyi 'og rnams su bya rgod la sogs pa brgyad rnams so //
translated: Under the eight left feet are the eight, Vulture and so forth.

original: 'dir dang por dur khrod la sogs par dam tshig bsten pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bar rang gi snying gar padma dang zla ba la dh'i: yig gi 'od kyis bkug pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: 'dir dang por dur khrod la sogs par dam tshig bsten pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bar rang gi snying gar padma dang zla ba la dh'i: yig gi 'od kyis bkug pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Here, first, in a charnel ground, etc., having gone for refuge, etc.,🔽having previously gone for refuge, etc., in one's heart on a lotus and moon, having invited glorious Vajrabhairava with light from the syllable DHĪḤ, make perfect offerings.🔽

original: stong pa nyid ji srid pa bsgoms nas /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ji srid pa bsgoms nas /
translated: Here, first, in a charnel ground, and so on, having gone for refuge and so on, one should imagine that one is in a charnel ground, and so on, and having gone for refuge and so on, and so forth, having meditated on emptiness for as long as one wishes,🔽one should imagine that one is in a source of phenomena, and on a wind generated from yaṃ and a moon generated from aṃ, one’s own nature as Mañjuśrī generated from the letter dḥīḥ, in the heart of the causal vajra holder.

original: yud kyis chos 'byung du yam las skyes pa'i rlung la aam las skyes pa'i zla bar dh'i: yig las skyes pa'i 'jam pa'i dpal gyi gzugs can gyi bdag nyid rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar a'a: yig las skyes pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um las skyes
analyzed: yud kyis chos 'byung du yam las skyes pa'i rlung la aam las skyes pa'i zla bar dh'i: yig las skyes pa'i 'jam pa'i dpal gyi gzugs can gyi bdag nyid rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar a'a: yig las skyes pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um las skyes
translated: In the heart of the causal vajra holder, in the center of a moon generated from aḥ, is a hūṃ generated from a sun, upon which is a hūṃ-letter.

original: pa'i rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um yig gi 'od rnams kyis bkug pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed yang dag par mchod nas bdag nyid la bcug cing /
analyzed: pa'i rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um yig gi 'od rnams kyis bkug pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed yang dag par mchod nas bdag nyid la bcug cing /
translated: The light of the hūṃ-letter invites glorious Vajrabhairava, who is perfectly offered.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid chos 'byung du chu skyes dang @262a * //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid chos 'byung du chu skyes dang @262a * //
translated: One should imagine that he enters oneself, and he completely transforms into oneself as the source of phenomena, upon a moon and sun in the center of a lotus.

original: rlung dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mi la sogs pa rnams dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams zhabs rnams kyis mnan pa'i 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mi la sogs pa rnams dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams zhabs rnams kyis mnan pa'i 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Meditate on the glorious Vajrabhairava, the nature of Vajra Holder, with his feet trampling on the circles of wind and sun, and on humans and so forth and Brahma and so forth.

original: de'i rjes su aom hr'i: sht'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pas 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / aom hr'i: sht'i wi kri t'a na na h'um phat ces pa'i yi ge bcu pa dang / aom ya m'a nta ka h'um phat ces pa yi ge bdun pa dang /🔽aom ya ma r'a dz'a sa do me ya /🔽ya me do ru na yo da ya /🔽ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
analyzed: de'i rjes su aom hr'i: sht'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pas 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / aom hr'i: sht'i wi kri t'a na na h'um phat ces pa'i yi ge bcu pa dang / aom ya m'a nta ka h'um phat ces pa yi ge bdun pa dang / aom ya ma r'a dz'a sa do me ya / ya me do ru na yo da ya / ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
translated: After that, recite the ten-syllable mantra that will be explained, “Oṃ hrīḥ ṣṭṛīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā,” and the seven-syllable mantra, “Oṃ yamāntaka hūṃ phaṭ.”

original: ya kshe ya tstsha ni r'a ma ya phat ces pa phreng ba'i sngags bzlas so //
analyzed: ya kshe ya tstsha ni r'a ma ya phat ces pa phreng ba'i sngags bzlas so //
translated: Recite the garland mantra, “Oṃ yamāraya siddhi viṣa yamayama ruṇa yoge yamayo niraya kṣe yama kṣe yaccha niraya māraya phaṭ.”

original: drag po'i las thams cad ces pa thob par byed pa nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: drag po'i las thams cad ces pa thob par byed pa nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: “All fierce activities” indicates the attainment of the fierce activity itself.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all mundane and supramundane accomplishments are achieved.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su yud kyis skyed par byed pa'i shing rta'i dbus su pam las skyes pa'i padma la aam las skyes pa'i zla bar m'am yongs su gyur pa 'od zer can g-yas brkyang gi zla bo'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su yud kyis skyed par byed pa'i shing rta'i dbus su pam las skyes pa'i padma la aam las skyes pa'i zla bar m'am yongs su gyur pa 'od zer can g-yas brkyang gi zla bo'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
translated: Immediately after emptiness, in the middle of a chariot generated in an instant, on a lotus born from a pam syllable on a moon born from an aṃ syllable, is a ma or a complete transformation into a two-armed Tārā standing in the posture of right leg extended,

original: gdug pa can rnams kyi kha dang mig ngag 'tshem pa /
analyzed: gdug pa can rnams kyi kha dang mig ngag 'tshem pa /
translated: her mouth and eyes blazing.

original: zhal g-yas pa sngo ba /
analyzed: zhal g-yas pa sngo ba /
translated: Her right face is blue,

original: g-yon pa dkar ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa dkar ba'o //
translated: and the left face is white.

original: 'di'i sngags 'chad par 'gyur ba gnyis po mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig spel ba bzlas so //
analyzed: 'di'i sngags 'chad par 'gyur ba gnyis po mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig spel ba bzlas so //
translated: Recite the two mantras that will be explained, alternating the words as desired.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni stong pa nyid do ;
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni stong pa nyid do ;
translated: The realm of space is emptiness.

original: / chu skyes dkar por nyi ma la pam ser po las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang pam yongs su gyur pa /
analyzed: / chu skyes dkar por nyi ma la pam ser po las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang pam yongs su gyur pa /
translated: On a white lotus on a sun, from a yellow pam syllable is a vajra cross and a pam syllable, which completely transform into

original: shing lo dang sgro'i sham thabs can /
analyzed: shing lo dang sgro'i sham thabs can /
translated: a garment of bark and antelope skin,🔽and a girdle of human bone.

original: sbom pa zhal g-yas pa sngo ba /
analyzed: sbom pa zhal g-yas pa sngo ba /
translated: Her right face is blue,

original: g-yon dmar ba 'og tu bgegs rnams bsgyel nas g-yas brkyang zla bo'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: g-yon dmar ba 'og tu bgegs rnams bsgyel nas g-yas brkyang zla bo'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
translated: She is red on the left, trampling on obstacles below, standing in the pose of right leg extended, with a moon seat.

original: mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa /
analyzed: mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa /
translated: She is sealed by Akṣobhya.

original: snying gar g-yon pa'i khu tshur sdigs mdzub kyi 'og tu bgegs kyi tshogs rnams bsdigs te /
analyzed: snying gar g-yon pa'i khu tshur sdigs mdzub kyi 'og tu bgegs kyi tshogs rnams bsdigs te /
translated: At the heart, with the left fist threatening, she threatens the hosts of obstacles below.

original: g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur brdeg pa'i tshul can no zhes pa ri khrod lo ma can gcig go //
analyzed: g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur brdeg pa'i tshul can no zhes pa ri khrod lo ma can gcig go //
translated: With the right vajra fist, she makes the gesture of striking. This is the single-cloth-wearing Śyāmā.

original: gang gi tshe 'di kha dog dkar bzla ba'i gzugs can bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa bsgom par bya ba de'i tshe gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di kha dog dkar bzla ba'i gzugs can bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa bsgom par bya ba de'i tshe gnyis pa'o //
translated: When she is meditated on as white in color, having the form of the moon, and raining nectar, then she is the second.

original: ri khrod ma gnyis po 'di'i sngags 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ri khrod ma gnyis po 'di'i sngags 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The mantras of these two Śyāmās will be explained.

original: khro mo'i gzugs ni dam tshig sems dpa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: khro mo'i gzugs ni dam tshig sems dpa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The form of the wrathful one is the essence of the pledge being.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The king of wrathful ones is the awareness being.

original: rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag dag gis rang 'dra'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag dag gis rang 'dra'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
translated: With the two hands holding a vajra and a vajra-bell, he embraces the wisdom consort who is similar to himself.

original: phyag g-yas pa gnyis pa na rtse @262b gsum pa 'phyar ba /
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa gnyis pa na rtse @262b gsum pa 'phyar ba /
translated: In his second right hand he brandishes a trident.

original: g-yon par thod pa /
analyzed: g-yon par thod pa /
translated: In the left he holds a skull.

original: rtsa ba'i zhal dkar ba /🔽byang dmar ba /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i zhal dkar ba / byang dmar ba /
translated: His main face is white.🔽The northern face is red.

original: nub ser ba /
analyzed: nub ser ba /
translated: The western face is yellow.

original: g-yas nag po'o //
analyzed: g-yas nag po'o //
translated: The right face is black.

original: yi dags chen po ni 'dir 'jigs byed do //
analyzed: yi dags chen po ni 'dir 'jigs byed do //
translated: The great ghost is Bhairava here.

original: de skad du ni de kho na nyid 'dus bar /
analyzed: de skad du ni de kho na nyid 'dus bar /
translated: Thus it is said in the Compendium of Reality:

original: ka ta pu ta na zhes pa la sogs pa'i bod pa'o //
analyzed: ka ta pu ta na zhes pa la sogs pa'i bod pa'o //
translated: The one called Kataputa, etc.

original: nye bar mtshon pa las goo r'i yang ste ;
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa las goo r'i yang ste ;
translated: The one who is illustrated is also Gaurī,

original: sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba'i steng du'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba'i steng du'o //
translated: on a multicolored lotus and moon.

original: kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od ni nyi ma'i 'od dang dkyil 'khor can no //
analyzed: kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od ni nyi ma'i 'od dang dkyil 'khor can no //
translated: Her color is red, and her equal radiance is the light and orb of the sun.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdzes pa ni dbu la'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdzes pa ni dbu la'o //
translated: She is beautified by the Buddhas on her head.

original: rta'i gzugs nag po //
analyzed: rta'i gzugs nag po //
translated: The horse form is black.🔽In his right hands he holds a hook and a sword,

original: phyag g-yas pa na lcags kyu dang ral gri dag / g-yon pa dag na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dag go //
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa na lcags kyu dang ral gri dag / g-yon pa dag na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dag go //
translated: and in his left hands he makes a threatening gesture with a noose and holds a bell.

original: zhal g-yas pa dkar ba /🔽g-yon ser ba /

analyzed: chang 'tshong ma la sogs pa'i khyim na gnas pa'i chang dgug go //

analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan gsungs pa /

analyzed: 'di gsungs te /

analyzed: rta mgrin gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'am /

analyzed: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis /
translated: or with the yoga of Arya Acalanatha, which will be explained from the tantra taught elsewhere,🔽in the center of a square with black musk scent, in the center of each ya, the seven bindus are the essence of the seven wind mandalas arisen from yam and blessed.

translated: From that, arisen and abiding there, the black wind god riding a deer, with a retinue of six, one principal one, are imagined to be bound by the wisdom-being, who is of the same nature as the wrathful one extracted from the heart, summoned by the noose.

analyzed: badzra h'um bam dha zhes klog cing dbugs nang du bcug pas /

original: kham phor kha sbub pa /
analyzed: kham phor kha sbub pa /

analyzed: h'um sum h'um las skyes pa'i ri rab rtse brgyad pa'i ngo @264b bos bkab nas /

original: de'i steng du lam las skyes shing rdo rjes mtshan pa gru bzhi pa ser po sa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rdo rje chen pos mnan pa bsgoms la /

analyzed: dbugs bsdams pas thams cad g-yas brkyang stabs kyi rkang pa g-yon pas nyed cing mdun du ral gri dang zhags pa'i lag pas /

analyzed: rlung lha la bsdigs shing sngags bzlas pas rab gnas la sogs pa la rlung chen po nye bar zhi'o //
translated: By reciting the mantra while threatening the wind god, a great wind will be pacified in a consecration and so forth.

original: klu'i sa bon ni nam'o //
analyzed: klu'i sa bon ni nam'o //

original: gzir ba ni gzir byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzir ba ni gzir byed pa'o //

original: h'um yig ni dang por dang tha mar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: h'um yig ni dang por dang tha mar gnas pa'o //

analyzed: 'dab mar gnas pa'i klu brgyad rnams mjug ma rnams la dang chu lha lte bar gzir cing /

analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim par bzlas pas char pa 'bebs so //

translated: One should meditate on oneself as Hayagrīva, the light of which radiates in the ten directions, the color of the red sun, and imagine that the seven great clouds, such as the whirling water cloud, are drawn in by the breath and eaten by the flaming tongue born from the syllable hūṃ and consecrated by it.

original: chu 'khyil ba la sogs pa'i sprin chen po bdun rnams dbugs kyis bkug pa zos nas phyir 'byung ba'i dbugs kyis gtor bar bya'o //
analyzed: chu 'khyil ba la sogs pa'i sprin chen po bdun rnams dbugs kyis bkug pa zos nas phyir 'byung ba'i dbugs kyis gtor bar bya'o //

translated: If one is diligent in threatening with the syllable hūṃ, and imagines that the entire host of the vajra wrathful bodies are emanated from the seed syllable at the heart, and with various weapons such as swords, etc., one can avert excessive rain.

original: gnas ni lus so //
analyzed: gnas ni lus so //

original: ji skad bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa can rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsams te /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa can rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsams te /

translated: Alternatively, one should make a human effigy from human blood and earth, and make it of the same nature as the obstructors of the victim. Then, as before, one should meditate on the form of the wrathful one. With a kīla of human bone,

analyzed: che ge'i bi ghn'am k'i la ye zhes spel nas phur pa'i sngags kyis phur pas btab ste /

original: brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdungs shing mig dga' chad par 'gyur ba'i 'od zer can gyi sngags kyis lan nyi shur mngon par bsngags te /🔽khro bo gnod mdzes kyis //

translated: One should strike it with the mantra of striking, and one should enchant it twenty times with the mantra of Māmakī, which is the light ray that delights the eyes.

analyzed: aom sum bha zhes pa bka'i @265a * //

analyzed: sngags kyis brdung bzhin pa myur bas tshogs bdag gi zhal du bcug pa nyams par bsgom mo //

analyzed: 'tsham pa med pa'i me zhes kha cig tu klog go //

analyzed: sngags pa kha shar du bltas pas /

analyzed: de nas sngags 'di grub par 'gyur ro //
