translated: Oṃ maṃ mahāpadma hūṃ naṃ hūṃ varṣaya svāhā.🔽Oṃ śaṃ śaṅkhapāla hūṃ naṃ hūṃ varṣaya svāhā.

original: aom kam ka rko t'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom kam ka rko t'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ kaṃ karīka hūṃ naṃ hūṃ varṣaya svāhā.

original: aom aam aa na ba ta pt'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aam aa na ba ta pt'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ aṃ anantapatta hūṃ naṃ hūṃ varṣaya svāhā.

original: aom bam ba ru n'a ya /
analyzed: aom bam ba ru n'a ya /
translated: Oṃ vaṃ varuṇa

original: n'a ga aa dhi pa ta yi n'a g'a na wa rsha ya h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: n'a ga aa dhi pa ta yi n'a g'a na wa rsha ya h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: nāgādhipate nāgānāṃ varṣaya hūṃ naṃ hūṃ svāhā.

original: zhes pa'o // de'i rjes su rdo rje mkha' lding gi gshog pa'i rlung rnams kyis mtshams med pa'i me zhi bar byed cing /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de'i rjes su rdo rje mkha' lding gi gshog pa'i rlung rnams kyis mtshams med pa'i me zhi bar byed cing /
translated: After that, the winds of the wings of the vajra garuḍa extinguish the fire of the great conflagration.

original: mchu bsnun pas kyang chu bo byed do zhes pa bsgom zhing /
analyzed: mchu bsnun pas kyang chu bo byed do zhes pa bsgom zhing /
translated: And with the beak, he makes rain.

original: aom badzra n'a r'a ya na zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas so //
analyzed: aom badzra n'a r'a ya na zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas so //
translated: One should meditate on that and recite the mantra “Oṃ vajranārayana” and so forth.

original: de nas zhag bdun gyi nang du klu rnams thams cad chu kun nas 'bab par byed do //
analyzed: de nas zhag bdun gyi nang du klu rnams thams cad chu kun nas 'bab par byed do //
translated: Then, within seven days, all the nāgas will cause the water to flow everywhere.

original: char chen gu gul dang sa rdza ras dang sgog skya rnams kyis bdugs pas thang sku la gnas pa'i klu rnams sreg cing /
analyzed: char chen gu gul dang sa rdza ras dang sgog skya rnams kyis bdugs pas thang sku la gnas pa'i klu rnams sreg cing /
translated: By fumigating with great rain, gugul, earth, clay, and garlic, the nāgas dwelling in the painting are burned.

original: klog pa spangs nas bzlas bya bzlas pas char ches pa zlog par byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: klog pa spangs nas bzlas bya bzlas pas char ches pa zlog par byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: Having abandoned reading, one should perform the recitation. By the recitation, one will avert excessive rain.

original: yang na rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ma ram rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor can nam rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis nam mkha' la h'um gam h'um yongs su gyur pa mkha' lding bka' byed pa /
analyzed: yang na rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ma ram rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor can nam rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis nam mkha' la h'um gam h'um yongs su gyur pa mkha' lding bka' byed pa /
translated: Or else, by the yoga of Vajrasattva, or by the yoga of Vajra Humkara, or by the yoga of one's chosen deity, one should imagine in the sky the garuḍa, the lord of the birds, who is the agent of the command, born from the transformation of a hum or hum.

original: zhal gyi chu stong phrag sbyin pa klu brgyad can bsams nas /
analyzed: zhal gyi chu stong phrag sbyin pa klu brgyad can bsams nas /
translated: He has a thousand mouths and gives a thousand gifts of water. He has eight nāgas.

original: aom badzra n'a r'a ya na zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra n'a r'a ya na zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya'o //
translated: One should incite him with the mantra beginning with oṃ vajra nārayaṇa.

original: 'di yang nam mkhar gnas pa'i brgya byin la bka' bsgo zhing /🔽de yang char @266a * //
analyzed: 'di yang nam mkhar gnas pa'i brgya byin la bka' bsgo zhing / de yang char @266a * //
translated: He, too, is in the sky, giving the command to Indra.

original: sprin pa rnams la char pa'i don du bka' bsgo bar byed do //
analyzed: sprin pa rnams la char pa'i don du bka' bsgo bar byed do //
translated: And he, in turn, commands the rain clouds to rain.

original: bka' yang thos nas chu'i char pa rnams kyis sprin rnams la me gsod pa lhur len par bsam zhing /
analyzed: bka' yang thos nas chu'i char pa rnams kyis sprin rnams la me gsod pa lhur len par bsam zhing /
translated: And having heard the command, one should imagine that the rain clouds are intent on extinguishing the fire with showers of water.

original: nam mkha' lding yang de ltar gsod par byed cing /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding yang de ltar gsod par byed cing /
translated: And the garuḍa, too, is intent on extinguishing it.

original: chu klung yang byed do zhes bsam mo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chu klung yang byed do zhes bsam mo zhes pa'o //
translated: And one should imagine that the river is doing so as well.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: The element of space is emptiness.

original: der chu skyes dmar po dang nyi ma la hr'i: las skyes pa'i autpala dmar po hr'i: yongs su gyur pa las ku ru ku lle'i gzugs dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po rnams kyi rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal can /
analyzed: der chu skyes dmar po dang nyi ma la hr'i: las skyes pa'i autpala dmar po hr'i: yongs su gyur pa las ku ru ku lle'i gzugs dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po rnams kyi rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal can /
translated: There, on a red lotus and sun, from HRĪḤ arises a red lotus with HRĪḤ, which transforms into the form of Kurukullā, red, blue, and white, with a root face and right and left faces.

original: phyag g-yas pa rnams su ral gri dang mda' dang da ma ru dang lcags kyu dang mi 'jigs pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa rnams su ral gri dang mda' dang da ma ru dang lcags kyu dang mi 'jigs pa'i tshul lo //
translated: In her right hands she holds a sword, arrow, ḍamaru, and goad, and she displays the gesture of fearlessness.

original: nyi mar gnas zhes pa nyi ma'i steng du rol gnas pa'o //
analyzed: nyi mar gnas zhes pa nyi ma'i steng du rol gnas pa'o //
translated: “Standing on a sun” means standing on a sun.

original: gos chen po ni 'dir 'dod pa'i lha'i pags pa'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gos chen po ni 'dir 'dod pa'i lha'i pags pa'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: “Great hide” is said to be the skin of a desire god here.

original: de bla rer gang gis lag pa gnyis kyis gzung ba de ni de skad do //
analyzed: de bla rer gang gis lag pa gnyis kyis gzung ba de ni de skad do //
translated: That which is held in both hands as a canopy is so called.

original: de'i phyir sgrol ma 'di phyag bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrol ma 'di phyag bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this Tārā has twelve arms.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa 'bum bzlas pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa 'bum bzlas pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
translated: Then, after one hundred thousand repetitions, and so on.

original: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ kuru ku llā hrīḥ svāhā.

original: zhes pa sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra.

original: rang gi lus las te snying gar gnas pa'i hr'i:'i sa bon las so //
analyzed: rang gi lus las te snying gar gnas pa'i hr'i:'i sa bon las so //
translated: From one's own body, that is, from the seed syllable hrīḥ located in the heart.

original: de'i zhes pa bsgrub bya'i 'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes pa bsgrub bya'i 'o //
translated: The his refers to the one to be accomplished.

original: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā.

original: zhes pa'i yi ge bcu pa'i sngags te ;
analyzed: zhes pa'i yi ge bcu pa'i sngags te ;
translated: This is the mantra of the ten syllables.

original: kha dog dmar po'o //
analyzed: kha dog dmar po'o //
translated: It is red in color.

original: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang bsgrub bya'i ye shes pa bkug nas bcug ste sngags bzlas so //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang bsgrub bya'i ye shes pa bkug nas bcug ste sngags bzlas so //
translated: Its light rays again summon the gnosis being of the one to be accomplished, and having caused him to enter, one should recite the mantra.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is the vajra.

original: spyan gsum pa dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i rtsa ba g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal gsum pa'o //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i rtsa ba g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal gsum pa'o //
translated: The three eyes are white, black, and red. The three faces are the root face and the right and left faces.

original: bsnyems pas zhes pa bsnyems pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bsnyems pa ste rdo rje dril bu'o //
analyzed: bsnyems pas zhes pa bsnyems pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bsnyems pa ste rdo rje dril bu'o //
translated: The arrogance is the arrogance because of possessing arrogance, that is, the vajra and the bell.

original: de'i sgeg pa dang bcas par dril bu 'dzin pas dkur gnas pa'i phyag ste /
analyzed: de'i sgeg pa dang bcas par dril bu 'dzin pas dkur gnas pa'i phyag ste /
translated: The hand is the hand that rests on the hip, holding the bell with the grace of that.

original: byed pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: byed pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The doing is the remainder.

original: lus las phyung ba ste /
analyzed: lus las phyung ba ste /
translated: The emerging from the body is the emerging from the body.

original: spros pa gang rnams kyis yin pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sprin gyi tshogs gang yin pa de rnams so /
analyzed: spros pa gang rnams kyis yin pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sprin gyi tshogs gang yin pa de rnams so /
translated: Those clouds of emanations are the emanations of those buddhas by which the elaborations are pacified.

original: sems can las phyung ba zhes klog pa las ni /
analyzed: sems can las phyung ba zhes klog pa las ni /
translated: If one reads “arisen from the karma of sentient beings,”

original: sems can las te lus can gyi gzugs las phyung ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sems can las te lus can gyi gzugs las phyung ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: then it means “arisen from the form of embodied beings.”

original: dbang bskur ni cod pan no //
analyzed: dbang bskur ni cod pan no //
translated: The consecration is the crown.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis cod pan la sogs pa rnams las 'dzag pa ste spros pa rnams so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis cod pan la sogs pa rnams las 'dzag pa ste spros pa rnams so //
translated: The elaborations are the dripping from the crown and so on of the Bhagavān.

original: de la man ngag tu byed pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su gzhal yas @266b khang gi nang du sna tshogs padma'i lte bar nyi ma la h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang h'um yongs su gyur pa bdud bzhi po g-yas brkyang stabs kyis mnan pa
analyzed: de la man ngag tu byed pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su gzhal yas @266b khang gi nang du sna tshogs padma'i lte bar nyi ma la h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang h'um yongs su gyur pa bdud bzhi po g-yas brkyang stabs kyis mnan pa
translated: The instruction is that following the emptiness, in the interior of the celestial mansion, on a multicolored lotus, from hūṃ on a sun, one should visualize oneself as Vajradhara, born from hūṃ, standing on the four māras, right leg extended,

original: phyag drug pa /
analyzed: phyag drug pa /
translated: with six faces,

original: mgo bo la sogs pa'i rgyan can /
analyzed: mgo bo la sogs pa'i rgyan can /
translated: adorned with a head ornament and so on,

original: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
translated: with orange hair streaming upward,

original: rang 'dra'i shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rang 'dra'i shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva, together with the wisdom of his own kind.

original: de'i sa bon kho na las 'dab ma rnams la /
analyzed: de'i sa bon kho na las 'dab ma rnams la /
translated: From his seed syllable alone, on the petals,

original: nyi ma dang ro rnams la lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: nyi ma dang ro rnams la lha mo rnams so //
translated: on the suns and on the flavors, are the goddesses.

original: de la shar du rdo rje mtshon cha ma ser mo ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i gtso bo dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal can no //🔽lho ru rdo rje k'i le k'i la dmar mo //
analyzed: de la shar du rdo rje mtshon cha ma ser mo ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i gtso bo dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal can no // lho ru rdo rje k'i le k'i la dmar mo //
translated: There, in the east, is Vajra Weapon, yellow, with yellow, blue, and green principal, right, and left faces.

original: dmar ba dang ser ba dang ljang ba'i zhal gsum pa'o //🔽nub tu rdo rje snum pa ma /🔽dkar po dang sngo ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum pa'o //
analyzed: dmar ba dang ser ba dang ljang ba'i zhal gsum pa'o // nub tu rdo rje snum pa ma / dkar po dang sngo ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum pa'o //
translated: In the south, Vajra Kilikila, red, with three faces, red, yellow, and green.🔽In the west, Vajra Oil, white, with three faces, white, blue, and red.

original: byang du rdo rje snyems ma ljang gu ma ljang gu dang dmar ba dang dkar ba'i zhal can no //
analyzed: byang du rdo rje snyems ma ljang gu ma ljang gu dang dmar ba dang dkar ba'i zhal can no //
translated: In the north, Vajra Arrogant, green, with three faces, green, red, and white.

original: lnga char yang spyan gsum pa skra grol ba gcer bu /
analyzed: lnga char yang spyan gsum pa skra grol ba gcer bu /
translated: All five have three eyes, loose hair, and are naked.

original: phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa /
translated: They are adorned with the five symbolic ornaments.

original: phyag bzhi pa /
analyzed: phyag bzhi pa /
translated: They have four arms.

original: bdag po bzhin du rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshon cha 'dzin pa rnams bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag po bzhin du rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshon cha 'dzin pa rnams bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine them holding vajras and so forth like the Lord.

original: de'i rjes su nam mkha' las lhung ba'i rdo rje /
analyzed: de'i rjes su nam mkha' las lhung ba'i rdo rje /
translated: After that, one should recite the mantra of the vajra falling from the sky,🔽Oṃ mahā

original: aom ma h'a zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags mthar che ge'i phyogs che ge ru badzra p'a tam ni wa ra ya phat /
analyzed: aom ma h'a zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags mthar che ge'i phyogs che ge ru badzra p'a tam ni wa ra ya phat /
translated: at the end of the mantra, In such and such a direction of such and such a person, vajra pātaya nivāraya phaṭ!

original: zhes pa spel nas byings dang bcas par zlos shing /
analyzed: zhes pa spel nas byings dang bcas par zlos shing /
translated: Reciting this along with the name,

original: rang nyid dang sangs rgyas spros pa rnams kyis rdo rje rngul phra rab tu phye mar byas pa rlung chen po sa ring du 'phen par bsgom pas nges par zlog par byed do //
analyzed: rang nyid dang sangs rgyas spros pa rnams kyis rdo rje rngul phra rab tu phye mar byas pa rlung chen po sa ring du 'phen par bsgom pas nges par zlog par byed do //
translated: one should meditate on oneself and the emanated buddhas pulverizing the vajra into tiny particles with their vajras, and the great wind blowing it far away. This will certainly avert [the lightning].

original: bsgrub bya yang sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs la sangs rgyas nyid du dbang bskur nas dar dpyangs dang phreng ba'i dbang bskur bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya yang sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs la sangs rgyas nyid du dbang bskur nas dar dpyangs dang phreng ba'i dbang bskur bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: One should also consecrate the person to be protected with this mantra, confer the empowerment of buddhahood on the form of Vajrasattva, and confer the empowerment of the hanging silk and garland.

original: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje byang chub sems nor bu las phyi rol du lhung ba zlog pa zhar la bshad pa'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje byang chub sems nor bu las phyi rol du lhung ba zlog pa zhar la bshad pa'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: The inner vajra-jewel, the bodhicitta, is prevented from falling outside.

original: byas na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byas na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the additional statement is stated in “if one does” and so forth.

original: shes rab dang thabs dag stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyis mdzes pa'i dga' ba ni legs par dga' ba ste /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs dag stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyis mdzes pa'i dga' ba ni legs par dga' ba ste /
translated: The beauty of the joy of the union of wisdom and method, by their being of the same taste as emptiness, is the good joy.

original: des byang chub kyi sems 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: des byang chub kyi sems 'ching ba'o //
translated: By that, the bodhicitta is bound.

original: gtum mo gsum la yang de kho nas bde blag tu yun ring du 'ching ba ste /
analyzed: gtum mo gsum la yang de kho nas bde blag tu yun ring du 'ching ba ste /
translated: By that alone, the three caṇḍālīs are easily bound for a long time.

original: btsan thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni de ltar ma yin no //
analyzed: btsan thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni de ltar ma yin no //
translated: The binding is not like that by the yoga of the forceful method.

original: des na de bcings pas rdo rje zlog pa ste /
analyzed: des na de bcings pas rdo rje zlog pa ste /
translated: Therefore, by binding that, the vajra is prevented from falling.

original: 'ching ba kho na zlog pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'ching ba kho na zlog pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “the binding alone is prevented from falling” is stated in “if one does” and so forth.

original: de ltar byas na ste zlog par gyur pa na gsungs pa'i dpal mchog gi dang po'i @267a * //
analyzed: de ltar byas na ste zlog par gyur pa na gsungs pa'i dpal mchog gi dang po'i @267a * //
translated: If one does that, if one prevents the bodhicitta from falling, then, as stated in the glorious Supreme Original Tantra,

original: rnal 'byor gyi bla na med pa'i go 'phang mchog tu zag pa med pa bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gsal bar 'gyur ba dang ldan par rnal 'byor pa 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi bla na med pa'i go 'phang mchog tu zag pa med pa bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gsal bar 'gyur ba dang ldan par rnal 'byor pa 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogi becomes endowed with the manifestation of the supreme, unsurpassed state of yoga, the nature of bliss, the nature of the vajra-holder, which is free from outflows.

original: dkyus ma las rab 'byam gyi don gsungs pa /
analyzed: dkyus ma las rab 'byam gyi don gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of the extensive ritual is stated:

original: gsod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Kill, etc.

original: 'di ste 'khrul 'khor zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: 'di ste 'khrul 'khor zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: This, i.e., the machine, is the remainder.

original: shar du mngon du phyogs pas ri mo drang por gnyis te /
analyzed: shar du mngon du phyogs pas ri mo drang por gnyis te /
translated: Facing east, two straight lines.

original: de bzhin du byang du mngon par phyogs pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang du mngon par phyogs pas so //
translated: Likewise, facing north.

original: dbus su ri mo zlum pos re mig dgu ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbus su ri mo zlum pos re mig dgu ru 'gyur ro //
translated: In the center, with a circular line, it becomes a nine-square grid.

original: de la ya ni dbus su ste /
analyzed: de la ya ni dbus su ste /
translated: There, ya is in the center,

original: ma me da kshe shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g-yas skor gyis so //
analyzed: ma me da kshe shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g-yas skor gyis so //
translated: ma, me, da, ka, śa, etc., in the directions, clockwise.

original: zur gyi re mig bzhi rnams su re mi ga so sor /
analyzed: zur gyi re mig bzhi rnams su re mi ga so sor /
translated: In the four corner squares, individually,

original: h'um che ge ra ksha zhes pa la sogs pa dang h'um zhes rab tu sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: h'um che ge ra ksha zhes pa la sogs pa dang h'um zhes rab tu sbyor ba'o //
translated: hum, chege, raksha, etc., and hum are applied.

original: zlum po'i ri mo las phyi rol du zur rnams su ri mo drang po bzhi byas pa na re mig bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: zlum po'i ri mo las phyi rol du zur rnams su ri mo drang po bzhi byas pa na re mig bcu gnyis so //
translated: When four straight lines are drawn from the outer corners of the circle, there are twelve squares.

original: de rnams su shar gyi re mi gnas brtsams nas /🔽g-yas skor gyis /🔽r'a dz'a sa do /
analyzed: de rnams su shar gyi re mi gnas brtsams nas / g-yas skor gyis / r'a dz'a sa do /
translated: Beginning in the eastern square,🔽one should write🔽rāja sa do

original: ru na yo ni ra ya tstsha ni zhes pa bri ste /
analyzed: ru na yo ni ra ya tstsha ni zhes pa bri ste /
translated: ruṇa yo ni ra ya tsa ni

original: sngags kyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: sngags kyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: in a clockwise direction, with the yoga of the deity of the mantra.

original: de las ya ma r'a dz'a sa do me ya /🔽ya me do ru na yod ya /
analyzed: de las ya ma r'a dz'a sa do me ya / ya me do ru na yod ya /
translated: From that, [the mantra] becomes🔽ya ma rā ṣa do me ya

original: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /

analyzed: de'i gnas bzhi rnams su rab tu sbyor ba'o //

analyzed: aom hr'i: shti: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /

analyzed: kri t'a zhes dang nan zhes dang / h'um h'um zhes dang phat phat ces dang sv'a zhes dang h'a zhes pa'o // gzhan brgyad rnams su dgod pa'o //
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ, ṣṭṛiḥ, vi, kṛtā, nān, hūṃ hūṃ, phaṭ phaṭ, svā, hā.🔽The other eight are written in the other eight squares.

analyzed: yi ge rnams thams cad dbu phyi rol du bstan pa'o //

analyzed: khros pa'i las nyid la dbus nas g-yas su phyung ste /

analyzed: g-yon skor gyis yi ge dgod pa'o //

analyzed: khros pas gshin rje'i phyogs su kha phyogs pas rang gi khrag dang / ro bsregs pa'i thal bas bya rog chen po'i gshog pa'i 'bri smyug gis bris te /
translated: In wrath, facing the direction of Yama, one writes with a pen made from the wing of a great crow with one’s blood and the ashes of a cremated corpse.

original: gsod la gshin rje'i lus la gnas //
analyzed: gsod la gshin rje'i lus la gnas //
translated: “ Killing, residing in the body of Yama,

original: sdang la ma he rta dag la'o //
analyzed: sdang la ma he rta dag la'o //

original: bskul la'ang rnga mo'i @267b rgyab la gnas //
analyzed: bskul la'ang rnga mo'i @267b rgyab la gnas //

original: zhi la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: zhi la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //

original: dbang la mi mo'i snying gar ro //
analyzed: dbang la mi mo'i snying gar ro //

original: rgyas la rta yi rgyab tu'o //
analyzed: rgyas la rta yi rgyab tu'o //

analyzed: rengs pa dang dgug pa la sogs pa rnams la mngon par brtag par bya'o //

analyzed: kham phor kha sbyar du 'khrul 'khor gzhag go //

analyzed: yang zhes gsungs pa ni mya ngan med pa'i brgyad pa la sogs pa la ltos pas te /

analyzed: myos byed kyi 'bras bu dang thig le dag ni der yang shes par bya ba dag go //

analyzed: 'bras bu'i khu bdag ni khu ba dang rdul dag go ;

analyzed: sngon du 'bum bzlas pas phyi nas spel tshig go //

analyzed: g-yas brkyang stabs kyis gnas pa dkar po mi'i gdong pa can /

analyzed: g-yon pas yid 'od ma la rol pa dang bcas par 'khyud pa /

analyzed: g-yas pas autpala 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: so sor gnas pa'i aom yig dkar po'i 'od zer rnams kyis bdud rtsi char du 'bebs shing /

translated: The stream of nectar that definitely comes from the hoods and eyes fills the body from the head down, and one should imagine that the poison is removed.

analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gsum ni /

analyzed: kye'i rdo rje bzhi gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis so //

analyzed: zla ba la khu ba dang nyi ma la rdul bsre'o //

analyzed: bye ba drug rnams sngon du bsnyen par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i rjes su las ni s'a lu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga @268a * //

original: ni nang du'o //
analyzed: ni nang du'o //

analyzed: bye ba bzlas pa'i rjes thogs su /

original: de nas ril bu 'grub po //
analyzed: de nas ril bu 'grub po //

analyzed: lha rnams kyi zhes pa pha rol po'i lta ba'i lha rnams so //

analyzed: de kho na ni rdo rje can te /

analyzed: ro bcud 'ching ba la gzhom du med pa'i nus pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: 'dir pa l'a sha'i sa bon gyi snying po gzung ngo //

analyzed: rgyal la zhes pa skar ma rgyal la'o //

analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes pa chu sngon po can gyi klu'i rdzing bu'i /
translated: “According to the rite” means in a nāga pond with blue water.

analyzed: aom a'a: phu: zhes pa'i sngags kyi brgyad lhag pa'i brgyar bsngags pa'i sa kha dog sngon po'i dbus su sngags de bsgoms nas /

analyzed: sa des yang dag par bkod pa'i mtha' yas sngags des yongs su gyur pa can bsam mo zhes pa cho ga'o //

original: cho gas zhes pa /

analyzed: mi bskyod pa rnam par dag pas rdul tshon nag po dur khrod kyi sol bas bya'o //

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pas rdul tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye mas so //

analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan rnam par dag pas rdul tshon ser po ni ba blas so //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par dag pas rdul tshon sngon po ni mi'i rus pa dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dag gis so //

analyzed: bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad pa la sbyang ba byas pa'i ro'i sa gzhi la thig skud byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /

original: ji srid du 'dus bya ba rdzogs pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: ji srid du 'dus bya ba rdzogs pa'i bar du ste /

analyzed: skud pa des mthe bong gsum lhag pa'i khru gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor thig btab nas /

analyzed: rdul tshon rnams kyis mi @268b bskyod pa rnam par dag pas bzhengs te /

analyzed: yang na kye'i rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams bri bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //

original: shin tu ba ni brtson 'grus chen po'i tshul can no //
analyzed: shin tu ba ni brtson 'grus chen po'i tshul can no //

original: khro bo'i sems ni khros zin pa'i sems so //
analyzed: khro bo'i sems ni khros zin pa'i sems so //

analyzed: bzlog nas zhes pa sv'a h'a la sogs pa'i tshig gi zlog pas bzlas so //
translated: “Having turned away” means having turned away from the words of svaha and so forth.

original: aa rdza ka ni pa rn'a sha'o //
analyzed: aa rdza ka ni pa rn'a sha'o //
translated: Arjaka is parnasa.

original: 'dis ni gdon mi za bar char 'bab po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni gdon mi za bar char 'bab po zhes gsungs so //
translated: This says that rain will certainly fall.

original: de'i tshe zhes pa gang gi tshe char ches par 'gyur ba de'i chos bcu bzhi pa la sogs pa la ro'i kha bkab pa'i ras kyi dum bu gcig la 'dug cing /

translated: “At that time” means when there is too much rain, one should sit on a piece of cloth that covers the mouth of a corpse in the fourteenth and so forth,

original: dum bu gzhan la sngags bris te bzlas pas /
analyzed: dum bu gzhan la sngags bris te bzlas pas /
translated: and write the mantra on another piece of cloth and recite it.

original: sprin rnams dral bar byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sprin rnams dral bar byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: It says that the clouds will be dispersed.

original: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /

analyzed: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu brgyad pa'o /
translated: The twenty-eighth flower from the Bouquet of Instructions.

original: bcom ldan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavān and so forth.

original: gong med rnams kyis ni 'di rnams las mchog khyad par du 'phags pa yod pa ma yin pa zhes pa rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gong med rnams kyis ni 'di rnams las mchog khyad par du 'phags pa yod pa ma yin pa zhes pa rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Without higher means that there is no other supreme and special one among these. This is for the yogins of the Vajra Vehicle.

original: mtshon bya rnams kyi mtshan nyid de ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid na yang kha cig tu tshig sdud du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshon bya rnams kyi mtshan nyid de ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid na yang kha cig tu tshig sdud du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Although the characteristics of the objects of indication are indeed dependent, in some cases they are taught in a concise manner.

original: ci zhe na bzhi rnams kyi ste rdo rje la sogs pa mtshon bya rnams kyi de kho na nyid rang gi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: ci zhe na bzhi rnams kyi ste rdo rje la sogs pa mtshon bya rnams kyi de kho na nyid rang gi ngo bo ste /
translated: What is it? The reality, the nature, of the four objects of indication, the vajra and so forth.

original: thabs kyi rgyud kyi yan lag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyud kyi yan lag nyid kyis so //
translated: by the very branch of the method tantra.

original: 'khor ba las 'dis mchog tu sgrol //
analyzed: 'khor ba las 'dis mchog tu sgrol //
translated: By this, one is liberated from cyclic existence.

original: zhes pas 'khor ba las sgrol ba yang yin la mtshan nyid kyang ngo zhes pa 'dis ni nyan pa la shin tu don gnyer ba'i ched du spro bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pas 'khor ba las sgrol ba yang yin la mtshan nyid kyang ngo zhes pa 'dis ni nyan pa la shin tu don gnyer ba'i ched du spro bar byed pa'o //
translated: This states that it is also a liberation from cyclic existence, and also a characteristic. By this, it is an encouragement for the sake of the listener's intense interest in the meaning.

original: ji bzhin de nyid ces mdor bstan pa rgyas par 'chad de /
analyzed: ji bzhin de nyid ces mdor bstan pa rgyas par 'chad de /
translated: Just that suchness is taught in brief, and is explained extensively.

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje'i de kho na nyid dang po dang de'i rjes su dril bu dang bgrang phreng dang ye shes kyi de kho na nyid ces pa rim pas bstan pa mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i de kho na nyid dang po dang de'i rjes su dril bu dang bgrang phreng dang ye shes kyi de kho na nyid ces pa rim pas bstan pa mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: The suchness of the vajra is the first, and after that, the suchness of the bell, the rosary, and wisdom are taught in sequence. This is the brief explanation.

original: ji ltar 'khor ba las sgrol bar mdor bstan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'khor ba las sgrol bar mdor bstan pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, How is it taught in brief that one is liberated from cyclic existence?

original: gang @269a * //
analyzed: gang @269a * //
translated: It is because

original: phyir bzhi po'i de kho na nyid kyis de'i yul can rnam par rtog pa rnams 'khor ba'i chu bo'i rlabs rnams te /
analyzed: phyir bzhi po'i de kho na nyid kyis de'i yul can rnam par rtog pa rnams 'khor ba'i chu bo'i rlabs rnams te /
translated: the waves of the river of cyclic existence are the conceptual thoughts that are the subjects of the four suchnesses.

original: de rnams las shin tu brgal nas pha rol thar pa skyes bu'i don mchog tu don gnyer ba'i sems can gyi don mthun 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams las shin tu brgal nas pha rol thar pa skyes bu'i don mchog tu don gnyer ba'i sems can gyi don mthun 'dren pa'o //
translated: Having transcended those, the meaning of the supreme person is the meaning of the goal of sentient beings who are to be led to liberation.

original: so sor rgyas par 'chad de /
analyzed: so sor rgyas par 'chad de /
translated: He explains each one individually.

original: dbus su zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbus su zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the center, etc.

original: dbu ma la sogs pa'i rtse mo rnams la me long la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dbu ma la sogs pa'i rtse mo rnams la me long la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams bsam par bya'o //
translated: In the tips of the central channel, etc., one should contemplate Vairochana, etc., whose nature is the pristine wisdom of the mirror, etc.

original: rva las 'og tu lte ba'i mthar thug par padma'i 'dab ma rnams la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag brgyad rnams te /
analyzed: rva las 'og tu lte ba'i mthar thug par padma'i 'dab ma rnams la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag brgyad rnams te /
translated: From the horns, below, to the end of the navel, on the lotus petals, the eight members of perfect enlightenment.

original: thabs nyid kyis /
analyzed: thabs nyid kyis /
translated: By the method itself,

original: 'dir lam gyi yan lag rnams kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dir lam gyi yan lag rnams kho na'o //
translated: here the members of the path alone.

original: sa ji lta bar te /
analyzed: sa ji lta bar te /
translated: As are the stages,

original: gnas ji lta bar shar dang me la sogs pa'i rim pas byams pa dang sa'i snying po dang phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha' mdzod dang 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dpal dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po rnams bsam
analyzed: gnas ji lta bar shar dang me la sogs pa'i rim pas byams pa dang sa'i snying po dang phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha' mdzod dang 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dpal dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po rnams bsam
translated: In accordance with the directions, one should visualize Maitreya, Kṣitigarbha, Vajrapāṇi, Ākāśagarbha, Lokeśvara, Mañjuśrī, Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin, and Samantabhadra in the east, south, west, north, nadir, and zenith, respectively.

original: mo zhes rgyud gzhan gyi dgongs pas gdams ngag tu byed do //
analyzed: mo zhes rgyud gzhan gyi dgongs pas gdams ngag tu byed do //
translated: This is the instruction according to the intention of another tantra.

original: ji ltar 'don pa ltar ro zhes gzhan no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'don pa ltar ro zhes gzhan no //
translated: Another says, “just as it is recited.”

original: lha brgyad po 'di rnams gzhag go zhes pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: lha brgyad po 'di rnams gzhag go zhes pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: The summary is, “these eight deities are placed.”

original: dbus su ni rdo rje'i'o //
analyzed: dbus su ni rdo rje'i'o //
translated: In the center, the vajra.

original: lha'i sgo nga rnams kyi zhes pa sgo nga'i gnas su ye shes kyi lha ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'brel par bya ste /
analyzed: lha'i sgo nga rnams kyi zhes pa sgo nga'i gnas su ye shes kyi lha ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'brel par bya ste /
translated: The “divine eggs” are the places of the eggs. The gnosis deity is Vajrasattva.

original: lha thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na /
analyzed: lha thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na /
translated: Since he is the essence of the assembly of all deities,

original: de dang der shes rab dang thabs ro gcig par bsgom zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dang der shes rab dang thabs ro gcig par bsgom zhes pa'i don to //
translated: one should meditate on him and her as of one taste with wisdom and means.

original: chang zungs kyi mtha'i padma gzhan la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma rnams so //
analyzed: chang zungs kyi mtha'i padma gzhan la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma rnams so //
translated: On the other petals in the directions beginning with the east, one should visualize Vajrāṅkuśī, Vajrapāśī, Vajrasphoṭī, and Vajrāṭṭī.

original: phyogs bral te phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma rnams su rtsen ma ste tsu nd'a dang / rin chen sgron ma dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dang gzhan gyis mi thub ma rnams bsam mo //
analyzed: phyogs bral te phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma rnams su rtsen ma ste tsu nd'a dang / rin chen sgron ma dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dang gzhan gyis mi thub ma rnams bsam mo //
translated: On the petals in the intermediate directions, one should visualize Cundā, Ratnapradīpā, Vajrāvalī, and Aparājitā.

original: mtha' gzhan gyi rtse mo rnams la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: mtha' gzhan gyi rtse mo rnams la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: On the other tips, one should visualize Jñānadākinī and so forth.

original: mtha' rnams kyi ni mtha' ru ste nub kyi phyogs su'o //
analyzed: mtha' rnams kyi ni mtha' ru ste nub kyi phyogs su'o //
translated: At the end of the end, that is, in the west,

original: de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rnams lha ru shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rnams lha ru shes par bya ste /
translated: one should visualize the vajra reality, that is, the deities.

original: mkhas pa kun rdzob dang cig shos kyi rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa la byang ba'i shes pa can gyis so //
analyzed: mkhas pa kun rdzob dang cig shos kyi rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa la byang ba'i shes pa can gyis so //
translated: One who is skilled, that is, who has knowledge of the aspects of the purity of the conventional and the other,

original: ci ltar don dam pa shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar don dam pa shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: how is one to know the ultimate?

original: gang phyir rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rnams ni /
analyzed: gang phyir rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rnams ni /
translated: Because of the vajra-ness of the vajra-realities,

original: rdo rje'i @269b bdag nyid yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i @269b bdag nyid yin te /
translated: the vajra-ness of the vajra-selves,

original: rdo rje'i ste /🔽stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i ste / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: the vajra-ness of the vajra-bodies,

original: de'i bdag nyid de'i rang bzhin phyi'i rdo rje sems la nges par gyur pa na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid de'i rang bzhin phyi'i rdo rje sems la nges par gyur pa na /
translated: the vajra-ness of the vajra-minds,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-speech,

original: rnal 'byor pa'i ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i ste /
translated: the vajra-ness of the vajra-actions,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-pledges,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-gnosis,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-siddhis,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-families,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-lineages,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-masters,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-disciples,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-vajras,🔽the vajra-ness of the vajra-vajra-ness,

original: rang nyid kyang bden pa gnyis la lhag par mos pa'i ngo bo rdo rje'i don bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyang bden pa gnyis la lhag par mos pa'i ngo bo rdo rje'i don bstan par bya'o //
translated: the vajra-ness of the vajra-vajra-ness of the vajra-vaj

original: de la don dam pa rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems kho na chos te gzugs la sogs pa chos can rnams so //
analyzed: de la don dam pa rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems kho na chos te gzugs la sogs pa chos can rnams so //
translated: The ultimate reality is the vajra-mind-of-enlightenment alone, which is the Dharma. The forms, etc., are the phenomena.
